quote: Try, reach, want, and you may fall. But even if you do, you might be okay anyway.  If you don't try, you save nothing, because you might as well be dead.
author: Ann Brashares
title: Girls in Pants: The Third Summer of the Sisterhood

quote: Wherever the art of Medicine is loved, there is also a love of Humanity.
author: Hippocrates

quote: When you say "I" and "my" too much, you lose the capacity to understand the "we" and "our".
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: What hurts us is what heals us
author: Paulo Coelho
title: Aleph

quote: Your inner strength is your outer foundation
author: Allan Rufus

quote: Where your talents and the needs of the world cross, there lies your vocation.
author: Aristotle

quote: Silence is argument carried out by other means.
author: Ernesto "Che" Guevara

quote: To every problem, there is a most simple solution.
author: Agatha Christie
title: The Clocks

quote: There are scores of people waiting for someone just like us to come along; people who will appreciate our compassion, our encouragement, who will need our unique talents. Someone who will live a happier life merely because we took the time to share what we had to give.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: It`s not how old you are, it`s how you are old.
author: Jules Renard

quote: karapatan kong madapa at bumangon sa buhay nang walang tatawa, magagalit, magtatanong, o magbibilang kung ilang beses na 'kong nagkamali at ilang ulit ako dapat bumawi
author: Bob Ong
title: ABNKKBSNPLAKo?!

quote: The mistake ninety-nine percent of humanity made, as far as Fats could see, was being ashamed of what they were; lying about it, trying to be somebody else.
author: J.K. Rowling
title: The Casual Vacancy

quote: Never apologize for showing feeling. When you do so, you apologize for the truth.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: The sky is the limit... for some people aim higher nothing is impossible.
author: Demi Lovato

quote: You attract who you are being. When you work at being the type of person that you want to attract, you attract those kinds of people into your life.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Everything is determined, the beginning as well as the end, by forces over which we have no control. It is determined for the insect, as well as for the star. Human beings, vegetables, or cosmic dust, we all dance to a mysterious tune, intoned in the distance by an invisible piper.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: [BURR] I am the one thing in life I can control.
author: Lin-Manuel Miranda
title: Hamilton: The Revolution

quote: You enter the forest at the darkest point, where there is no path.  Where there is a way or path, it is someone else's path.  You are not on your own path.  If you follow someone else's way, you are not going to realize your potential.
author: Joseph Campbell
title: The Hero's Journey: Joseph Campbell on His Life & Work

quote: Run when you can, walk if you have to, crawl if you must; just never give up.
author: Dean Karnazes

quote: At the moment of commitment the entire universe conspires to assist you.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Two wrongs don't make a right, but don't three lefts make a right? Two wrongs don't make a right, but don't two negatives make a positive?
author: Andrew Clements
title: Things Not Seen

quote: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: None of us will ever accomplish anything excellent or commanding except when he listens to this whisper which is heard by him alone.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.
author: Anonymous
title: The Holy Bible: King James Version

quote: Keep good company, read good books, love good things and cultivate soul and body as faithfully as you can.
author: Louisa May Alcott
title: Rose in Bloom

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: A tamed woman will never leave her mark in the world.
author: robert m drake

quote: Do you train for passing tests or do you train for creative inquiry?
author: Noam Chomsky

quote: In the external scheme of things, shining moments are as brief as the twinkling of an eye, yet such twinklings are what eternity is made of -- moments when we human beings can say "I love you," "I'm proud of you," "I forgive you," "I'm grateful for you." That's what eternity is made of: invisible imperishable good stuff.
author: Fred Rogers
title: The World According to Mister Rogers: Important Things to Remember

quote: Heaven is comfort, but it's still not living.
author: Alice Sebold
title: The Lovely Bones

quote: We have just enough religion to make us hate, but not enough to make us love one another.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Do the kind of things that come from the heart, When you do, you won't be dissatisfied, you won't be envious, you won't be longing for somebody else's things. On the contrary, you'll be overhelmed with what comes back
author: Morrie Schwartz

quote: You’ve got to think about big things while you’re doing small things, so that all the small things go in the right direction.
author: Alvin Toffler

quote: The future was one thing that could never be broken, because it had not yet had the chance to be anything.
author: Sarah Dessen
title: Saint Anything

quote: If you have kindness in your heart, you offer acts of kindness to touch the hearts of others wherever you go—whether they are random or planned. Kindness becomes a way of life.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: If people make fun of you, that probably means you're doing something right.
author: Evanescence

quote: The opinion which other people have of you is their problem, not yours.
author: Elisabeth Kübler-Ross
title: On Life after Death

quote: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.  Believe in yourself, your abilities and your own potential. Never let self-doubt hold you captive. You are worthy of all that you dream of and hope for.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: If you fail to plan, you are planning to fail!
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: You can't always judge people by the things they done. You got to judge them by what they are doing now.
author: Kate DiCamillo
title: Because of Winn-Dixie

quote: We cannot have a world where everyone is a victim. "I'm this way because my father made me this way. I'm this way because my husband made me this way." Yes, we are indeed formed by traumas that happen to us. But then you must take charge, you must take over, you are responsible.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: There is no evidence that we've been placed on this planet to be especially happy or especially normal. And in fact our unhappiness and our strangeness, our anxieties and compulsions, those least fashionable aspects of our personalities, are quite often what lead us to do rather interesting things.
author: Jon Ronson
title: The Psychopath Test: A Journey Through the Madness Industry

quote: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds. The mediocre mind is incapable of understanding the man who refuses to bow blindly to conventional prejudices and chooses instead to express his opinions courageously and honestly.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The aim of every artist is to arrest motion, which is life, by artificial means and hold it fixed so that a hundred years later, when a stranger looks at it, it moves again since it is life.
author: William Faulkner

quote: Have you ever felt the longing for someone you could admire? For something, not to look down at, but up to?
author: Ayn Rand

quote: As long as you have life and breath, believe. Believe for those who cannot. Believe even if you have stopped believing. Believe for the sake of the dead, for love, to keep your heart beating, believe. Never give up, never despair, let no mystery confound you into the conclusion that mystery cannot be yours.
author: Mark Helprin
title: A Soldier of the Great War

quote: What we love determines what we seek. What we seek determines what we think and do. What we think and do determines who we are — and who we will become.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: There are some values that you should never compromise on to stay true to yourself; you should be brave to stand up for what you truly believe in even if you stand alone.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Every challenge you face today makes you stronger tomorrow. The challenge of life is intended to make you better, not bitter.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: The treacherous are ever distrustful.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
title: The Two Towers

quote: Friends can make you feel that the world is smaller and less sneaky than it really is, because you know people who have similar experiences.
author: Lemony Snicket
title: The Austere Academy

quote: Thou shalt not be a victim, thou shalt not be a perpetrator, but, above all, thou shalt not be a bystander.
author: Yehuda Bauer

quote: Do nothing, and nothing happens. Life is about decisions. You either make them or they're made for you, but you can't avoid them.
author: Mhairi McFarlane
title: You Had Me At Hello

quote: Because I trust in the ever-changing climate of the heart. (At least, today I feel that way.) I think it is necessary to have many experiences for the sake of feeling something; for the sake of being challenged, and for the sake of being expressive, to offer something to someone else, to learn what we are capable of.
author: Jason Mraz

quote: Sad stories make good books
author: Khaled Hosseini
title: The Kite Runner

quote: My name is Salmon, like the fish; first name, Susie. I was fourteen when I was murdered.
author: Alice Sebold
title: The Lovely Bones

quote: If we don't change the direction we are headed, we will end up where we are going.
author: Jodi Picoult
title: Nineteen Minutes

quote: Successful people have libraries. The rest have big screen TVs
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Its more fun to think of the future than dwell on the past.
author: Sara Shepard
title: Unbelievable

quote: We may have all come on different ships, but we're in the same boat now.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: And people who don’t dream, who don’t have any kind of imaginative life, they must… they must go nuts. I can’t imagine that.
author: Stephen King

quote: Great goals make great people. People cannot hit what they do not aim for.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Too much sanity may be madness — and maddest of all: to see life as it is, and not as it should be!
author: Dale Wasserman
title: Man of La Mancha: A Musical Play

quote: Death twitches my ear; 'Live,' he says...  'I'm coming.
author: Virgil

quote: No great wisdom can be reached without sacrifice.
author: C.S. Lewis
title: The Magician's Nephew

quote: It is better to be respected than it is to be popular. Popularity ends on yearbook day, but respect lasts forever.
author: John Bytheway

quote: Life is a series of surprises and would not be worth taking or keeping if it were not.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Every moment of light and dark is a miracle.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Try to remember it always," he said once Gogol had reached him, leading him slowly back across the breakwater, to where his mother and Sonia stood waiting. "Remember that you and I made this journey together to a place where there was nowhere left to go.
author: Jhumpa Lahiri
title: The Namesake

quote: You’re only poor if you give up. The most important thing is that you did something. Most people only talk and dream of getting rich. You’ve done something.
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
title: Rich Dad, Poor Dad

quote: Rule your mind or it will rule you.
author: Horace

quote: He who jumps into the void owes no explanation to those who stand and watch.
author: Jean-Luc Godard

quote: We crave for new sensations but soon become indifferent to them. The wonders of yesterday are today common occurrences
author: Nikola Tesla
title: My Inventions

quote: Look not mournfully into the past, it comes not back again. Wisely improve the present, it is thine. Go forth to meet the shadowy future without fear and with a manly heart.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: My dear Watson," said [Sherlock Holmes], "I cannot agree with those who rank modesty among the virtues. To the logician all things should be seen exactly as they are, and to underestimate one's self is as much a departure from truth as to exaggerate one's own powers.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
title: The Adventure of the Greek Interpreter (The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes, #9 )

quote: Humans have come into being for the sake of each other, so either teach them, or learn to bear them.
author: Marcus Aurelius
title: Meditations

quote: I know that the molecules in my body are traceable to phenomena in the cosmos. That makes me want to grab people on the street and say: ‘Have you HEARD THIS?
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: I want to be like Gandhi and Martin Luther King and John Lennon but i want to STAY ALIVE.
author: Madonna

quote: It's total bullshit," he said. "The whole thing. Eighty percent survival rate and he's in the twenty percent? Bullshit. He was such a bright kid. It's bullshit. I hate it. But it was sure a privilege to love him, huh?
author: John Green
title: The Fault in Our Stars

quote: Live life as though nobody is watching, and express yourself as though everyone is listening.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Stand up and walk. Move on. After all, you have perfect legs to stand on.
author: Arakawa Hiromu

quote: If you want something you can have it, but only if you want everything that goes with it, including all the hard work and the despair, and only if you're willing to risk failure.
author: Philip Pullman
title: Clockwork

quote: After all, you can't truly be happy if you've never known pain. You can't truly feel joy if you've never felt heartbreak. You can't know what it's like to be filled unless you've been empty.
author: Kelly Cutrone
title: If You Have to Cry, Go Outside: And Other Things Your Mother Never Told You

quote: I hope to write someday and that’s even more terrifying than performing. You don’t just entertain the audience, you give them little bits of your soul.
author: Chris Colfer

quote: When blame and self-judgement are transformed, healed, and cease to be, we have reawakened without the myth, the mythos, of separation. We are One.
author: Wendy E. Slater
title: Into the Hearth, Poems-Volume 14

quote: We lay there and looked up at the night sky and she told me about stars called blue squares and red swirls and I told her I'd never heard of them. Of course not, she said, the really important stuff they never tell you. You have to imagine it on your own.
author: Brian Andreas

quote: Let us pick up our books and our pens, they are the most powerful weapons.
author: Malala Yousafzai
title: I Am Malala: The Story of the Girl Who Stood Up for Education and Was Shot by the Taliban

quote: Many persons have a wrong idea of what constitutes true happiness. It is not attained through self-gratification but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Bring something incomprehensible into the world!
author: Gilles Deleuze
title: A Thousand Plateaus: Capitalism and Schizophrenia

quote: To love is easy, to be in a relationship is extremely difficult.
author: Santosh Kalwar
title: Quote Me Everyday

quote: If I am the pawn of the gods, it is because they know me so well, not because they make my mind up for me.
author: Megan Whalen Turner
title: The Queen of Attolia

quote: Action springs not from thought, but from a readiness for responsibility.
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quote: Go on, get out! Last words are for fools who haven't said enough!
author: Karl Marx

quote: Everything you'll ever need to know is within you; the secrets of the universe are imprinted on the cells of your body.
author: Dan Millman
title: Way of the Peaceful Warrior: A Book That Changes Lives

quote: A writer must teach himself that the basest of all things is to be afraid.
author: William Faulkner

quote: And though I have the gift of prophecy, and understand all mysteries, and all knowledge; and though I have all faith, so that I could remove mountains, but have not love, I am nothing.
author: Anonymous
title: Holy Bible: The New King James Version

quote: You say freak, I say unique.
author: Christian Baloga

quote: You have two choices, to conquer your fear or to let your fear conquer you.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: If you have the guts to be yourself, other people'll pay your price.
author: John Updike
title: Rabbit, Run

quote: Maybe 'Okay' will be our 'always'...
author: John Green
title: The Fault in Our Stars

quote: You have come a long way and have won many battles. Whenever you’re faced with a difficult or challenging situation, you’ll overcome it. Yes, you can.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Don't chase people. Be yourself, do your own thing and work hard. The right people - the ones who really belong in your life - will come to your. And stay.
author: Will Smith

quote: Be like the flower that gives its fragrance to even the hand that crushes it.
author: Imam Ali

quote: You need just the right amount of 'Fuck the world' and the right amount of belief in something...and you need the right amount of love.
author: Gerard Way

quote: I believe in the hands that work, in the brains that think, and in the hearts that love...I believe in sunshine, fresh air, friendship, calm sleep, beautiful thoughts.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Most people die with their music still locked up inside them.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Freedom is...the right to write the wrong words.
author: Patti Smith

quote: Even if you don't have all the things you want, be grateful for the things you don't have that you don't want (Bob Dylan's dad)
author: Bob Dylan
title: Chronicles, Volume One

quote: Let us pick up our books and our pens,” I said. “They are our most powerful weapons. One child, one teacher, one book and one pen can change the world.
author: Malala Yousafzai
title: I Am Malala: The Story of the Girl Who Stood Up for Education and Was Shot by the Taliban

quote: The best kind of humans are the ones who stay.
author: robert m drake

quote: Protect your enthusiasm from the negativity and fear of others. Never decide to do nothing just because you can only do little. Do what you can. You would be surprised at what "little" acts have done for our world.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Nobody steals books but your friends.
author: Roger Zelazny
title: The Guns of Avalon

quote: Death comes to us all; we can only choose how to face it when it comes.
author: Robert Jordan
title: The Dragon Reborn

quote: If you don’t like the road you’re walking, start paving another one.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: We cannot change what we are not aware of, and once we are aware, we cannot help but change.
author: Sheryl Sandberg
title: Lean In: Women, Work, and the Will to Lead

quote: Make today worth remembering.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Life consists of two days, one for you one against you. So when it's for you don't be proud or reckless, and when it's against you be patient, for both days are test for you.
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: A photographer is like a cod, which produces a million eggs in order that one may reach maturity.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Right now, we're living in an ugly chapter of our lives, but books always get better!
author: Chris Colfer
title: The Wishing Spell

quote: If you let lesser people determine your self-worth, you'll never reach higher than their limited imagination.
author: Ana Huang
title: Twisted Love

quote: Your children are not your children. They are the sons and daughters of Life's longing for itself...  You may house their bodies but not their souls, for their souls dwell in the house of tomorrow, which you cannot visit, not even in your dreams.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Don't look to the approval of others for your mental stability
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Make the most of what you have and keep your standards high. Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Sisters in battle, I am shield and blade to you. As I breathe, your enemies will know no sanctuary. While I live, your cause is mine.
author: Leigh Bardugo
title: Wonder Woman: Warbringer

quote: Life keeps throwing me lemons because I make the best lemonade...
author: King James Gadsden

quote: Differences are not intended to separate, to alienate. We are different precisely in order to realize our need of one another.
author: desmond tutu

quote: Your greatest self has been waiting your whole life; don't make it wait any longer.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Judging is preventing us from understanding a new truth. Free yourself from the rules of old judgments and create the space for new understanding.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: How does one become a butterfly? They have to want to learn to fly so much that you are willing to give up being a caterpillar.
author: Trina Paulus
title: Hope for the Flowers

quote: If you are a dreamer come in
author: Shel Silverstein

quote: Day after day, day after day, We stuck, nor breath nor motion; As idle as a painted ship Upon a painted ocean.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
title: The Rime of the Ancient Mariner

quote: If you fuel your journey on the opinions of others, you are going to run out of gas.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: ...mencintai itu, kadang mengumpulkan segala tabiat menyebalkan dari seseorang yang engkau cintai, memakinya, merasa tak sanggup lagi menjadi yang terbaik untuk dirinya, dan berpikir tak ada lagi jalan kembali, tapi tetap saja engkau tak sanggup benar-benar meninggalkannya.
author: Tasaro
title: Muhammad: Lelaki Penggenggam Hujan

quote: Love your life. Because your life is what you have to give.
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: Nobody gets praised for the right reasons.
author: Diana Wynne Jones
title: Castle in the Air

quote: We all have negative thoughts now and then, but we can choose not to dwell there and not to let them control us.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Keep your promises and be consistent. Be the kind of person others can trust.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Instead of complaining about the problem and blaming others, start finding the solution.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Leaders must be close enough to relate to others, but far enough ahead to motivate them.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: I am so, so alive.
author: Maggie Stiefvater
title: The Scorpio Races

quote: How would your life be different if…You approached all relationships with authenticity and honesty? Let today be the day…You dedicate yourself to building relationships on the solid foundation of truth and authenticity.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Achievement has no color
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The most powerful relationship you will ever have is the relationship with yourself.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: In my deepest wound I saw your glory, and it dazzled me.
author: St. Augustine

quote: She remembered who she was and the game changed.
author: Lalah Delia

quote: Meditation is a way for nourishing and blossoming the divinity within you.
author: Amit Ray
title: Meditation: Insights and Inspirations

quote: Every window in Alcatraz has a view of San Francisco.
author: Susanna Kaysen
title: Girl, Interrupted

quote: I lied and said I was busy. I was busy; but not in a way most people understand.  I was busy taking deeper breaths. I was busy silencing irrational thoughts. I was busy calming a racing heart. I was busy telling myself I am okay.  Sometimes, this is my busy - and I will not apologize for it.
author: Brittin Oakman

quote: A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: One of the best ways to influence people is to make them feel important. Most people enjoy those rare moments when others make them feel important. It is one of the deepest human desires.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: If we bear all this suffering and if there are still Jews left, when it is over, then Jews, instead of being doomed, will be held up as an example.
author: Anne Frank

quote: What fire does not destroy, it hardens
author: Oscar Wilde
title: The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: Live all you can: it's a mistake not to. It doesn't matter what you do in particular, so long as you have had your life. If you haven't had that, what have you had?
author: Henry James
title: The Ambassadors

quote: The road to enlightenment is long and difficult, and you should try not to forget snacks and magazines.
author: Anne Lamott
title: Traveling Mercies: Some Thoughts on Faith

quote: You don't have to make something that people call art. Living is an artistic activity, there is an art to getting through the day.
author: viggo mortensen

quote: In essence, if we want to direct our lives, we must take control of our consistent actions. It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: The best discoveries always happened to the people who weren't looking for it. Columbus and America. Pinzon, who stumbled on Brazil while looking for the West Indies. Stanley happening on Victoria Falls. And you. Amy Curry, when I was least expecting her. -Roger Sullivan
author: Morgan Matson
title: Amy & Roger's Epic Detour

quote: Ignore all hatred and criticism. Live for what you create, and die protecting it.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: We spend money that we do not have, on things we do not need, to impress people who do not care.
author: Will Smith

quote: Real change is difficult at the beginning. Without the familiar to rely upon, you may not in as much command as you had once been. When things are not going your way, you will start doubting yourself. Stay positive, keep the faith, and keep moving forward – your breakthrough may be just around the corner.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: I’d rather welcome change than cling to the past.
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
title: Rich Dad, Poor Dad

quote: Skies are crying, I am watching, Catching teardrops in my hands. Only silence, as it's ending, Like we never had a chance. Do you have to make me feel Like there's nothing left of me?
author: Demi Lovato

quote: I realize that life is risks. It’s acknowledging the past but looking forward. It’s taking a chance that we will make mistakes but believing that we all deserve to be forgiven.
author: Carrie Ryan
title: The Dead-Tossed Waves

quote: It's easy to forget things you don't need anymore.
author: Haruki Murakami
title: Kafka on the Shore

quote: He who takes offense when no offense is intended is a fool, and he who takes offense when offense is intended is a greater fool.
author: Brigham Young

quote: I was never more hated than when I tried to be honest. Or when, even as just now I've tried to articulate exactly what I felt to be the truth. No one was satisfied
author: Ralph Ellison
title: Invisible Man

quote: The question is not how to get cured, but how to live.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.
author: Alan Turing
title: Computing machinery and intelligence

quote: I'm the living embodiment of 'it could be worse'.
author: Dan Howell

quote: There are some things that it is better to begin than to refuse, even though the end may be dark.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
title: The Two Towers

quote: Women can fake an orgasm, but men can fake an entire relationship.
author: Sharon Stone

quote: Get comfortable with being uncomfortable!
author: Jillian Michaels

quote: Pet names are a persistant remnant of childhood, a reminder that life is not always so serious, so formal, so complicated. They are a reminder, too, that one is not all things to all people.
author: Jhumpa Lahiri
title: The Namesake

quote: Whoever you are, or whatever it is that you do, when you really want something, it's because that desire originated in the soul of the universe. It's your mission on earth.
author: Paulo Coelho
title: The Alchemist

quote: We swallowed the chaos because we knew we didn't want to be ordinary.
author: robert m drake

quote: For great men, religion is a way of making friends; small people make religion a fighting tool.
author: APJ Abdul Kalam
title: Ignited Minds: Unleashing the Power Within India

quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favour.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Happiness depends more on the inward disposition of mind than on outward circumstances.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: He who conquers himself is the mightiest warrior.
author: Confucius

quote: I never did give them hell. I just told the truth, and they thought it was hell.
author: Harry S. Truman

quote: For those who know the value of and exquisite taste of solitary freedom (for one is only free when alone), the act of leaving is the bravest and most beautiful of all.
author: Isabelle Eberhardt
title: The Nomad: Diaries of Isabelle Eberhardt

quote: The victim mindset dilutes the human potential. By not accepting personal responsibility for our circumstances, we greatly reduce our power to change them.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Great victory requires great risk. -Hera
author: Rick Riordan
title: The Lost Hero

quote: Love is like a good cake; you never know when it's coming, but you'd better eat it when it does!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Love is the only thing that we can carry with us when we go, and it makes the end so easy.
author: Louisa May Alcott
title: Good Wives

quote: Of course, a sign doesn't mean anything unless you know how to interpret it.
author: Arthur Golden
title: Memoirs of a Geisha

quote: ...try to remember that dreams do come true, but they don't come easily.
author: Josephine Angelini
title: Dreamless

quote: Courage and perseverance have a magical talisman, before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish into air.
author: John Quincy Adams

quote: The hardest battle you are ever going to have to fight is the battle to be just you.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: To plant a garden is to believe in tomorrow.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Politeness is okay, but it gets old and boring. You want to attack life with a passion, not a politeness, you want people to think about you and remember you and say "she is so passionate" you don't want people to think about you and remember you and say "she is so polite," because, who cares about polite?
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Anything that makes weak - physically, intellectually and spiritually, reject it as poison.
author: Vivekananda

quote: Try to find pleasure in the speed that you're not used to. Changing the way you do routine things allows a new person to grow inside of you. But when all is said and done, you're the one who must decide how you handle it.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The difference between false memories and true ones is the same as for jewels: it is always the false ones that look the most real, the most brilliant.
author: Salvador Dali

quote: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the mext moment
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Sometimes a little discomfort in the beginning can save a whole lot of pain down the road.
author: Wendelin Van Draanen
title: Flipped

quote: A quitter never wins-and-a winner never quits.
author: Napoleon Hill
title: Think and Grow Rich

quote: even  in the loneliest moments  i have been there for myself.
author: Sanober Khan

quote: A man's concern, even his despair, over the worthwhileness of life is an existential distress but by no means a mental disease.
author: Viktor E. Frankl
title: Man's Search for Meaning

quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
author: Maria Robinson

quote: A daydreamer is prepared for most things.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: My sun sets to rise again.
author: Robert Browning

quote: It is the useless things that make life worth living and that make life dangerous too: wine, love, art, beauty. Without them life is safe, but not worth bothering with.
author: Stephen Fry
title: Moab Is My Washpot

quote: You can fail at what you don't want, so you might as well take a chance on doing what you love.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: It has always seemed to me that a coward is a person who cares more about what people say than about what is right. Bravery isn't about what people call you, Spensa. It's about who you know yourself to be.
author: Brandon Sanderson
title: Skyward

quote: being afraid to take chances is scarier than actually doing things that challenge you.
author: Simone Elkeles
title: Leaving Paradise

quote: Life might take you down different roads. But each of you gets to decide which one to take.
author: Gayle Forman
title: If I Stay

quote: Sometimes you have to steer away from the crowd in order to be a better person. It's not always easy, that's for sure. But it's right. And sometimes doing the right thing feels good, even if it does end up in a trip to the principal's office.
author: Simone Elkeles
title: Leaving Paradise

quote: I am an optimist... I choose to be. There is a lot of darkness in our world, there is a lot of pain and you can choose to see that or you can choose to see the joy. If you try to respond positively to the world, you will spend your time better.
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: Keep your mind open. The meaning of things lies in how people perceive them. The same thing could mean different meanings to the same people at different times.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: It’s against the rules of humanity to believe there is nothing we can do.
author: Melina Marchetta
title: Finnikin of the Rock

quote: Aslan: You doubt your value. Don't run from who you are.
author: C.S. Lewis
title: Prince Caspian

quote: When things go wrong, you'll find they usually go on getting worse for some time; but when things once start going right they often go on getting better and better.
author: C.S. Lewis
title: The Horse and His Boy

quote: Kemampuan membaca itu sebuah rahmat. Kegemaran membaca; sebuah kebahagiaan.
author: Goenawan Mohamad

quote: Until justice rolls down like water and righteousness like a mighty stream.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: People who lack the clarity, courage, or determination to follow their own dreams will often find ways to discourage yours. Live your truth and don't EVER stop!
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Do not act as if you had ten thousand years to throw away. Death stands at your elbow. Be good for something while you live and it is in your power.
author: Marcus Aurelius
title: Meditations

quote: She had to choose what, of the things she inherited from the people who came before her, she wanted to bring forward. And what, of the past, she wanted to leave behind.
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
title: Malibu Rising

quote: Accept whatever comes to you woven in the pattern of your destiny, for what could more aptly fit your needs?
author: Marcus Aurelius
title: Meditations

quote: In the deepest hour of the night, confess to yourself that you would die if you were forbidden to write. And look deep into your heart where it spreads its roots, the answer, and ask yourself, must I write?
author: Rainer Maria Rilke
title: Letters to a Young Poet

quote: But I'm not special", Bailey says, "not the way they are. I'm not anyone important."  "I know", Celia said, "you are not destined or chosen. I wish I could tell you that you were if that would make it easier, but it is not true. You are in the right place, at the right time, and you care enough to do what needs to be done. Sometimes that is enough.
author: Erin Morgenstern
title: The Night Circus

quote: Life is no brief candle to me. It is a sort of splendid torch which I have got a hold of for the moment, and I want to make it burn as brightly as possible before handing it on to future generations.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Today is the oldest you've ever been, and the youngest you'll ever be again.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The Man who says he can, and the man who says he can not.. Are both correct
author: Confucius

quote: Learn everything you can, anytime you can, from anyone you can, there will always come a time when you will be grateful you did.
author: Sarah Caldwell

quote: If you think your boss is stupid, remember: you wouldn’t have a job if he was any smarter.
author: John Gottman (

quote: Team work makes the dream work
author: Rap Monster

quote: Is it easy? Usually not. But you don't forgive people for their benefit. You do it for your benefit.
author: Andrew Matthews

quote: Speak with integrity. Say only what you mean. Avoid using the word to speak against yourslef or to gossip about others. Use your power of your word in the direction of truth and love.
author: Don Miguel Ruiz
title: The Four Agreements

quote: Never give a sword to a man who can't dance.
author: Confucius
title: The Analects

quote: The heart may freeze, or it can burn. The pain will ease and I can learn. There is no future, there is no past. I live this moment as, my last.
author: Jonathan Larson
title: Rent: The Complete Book and Lyrics of the Broadway Musical

quote: Let's start a new tomorrow, today.
author: Neil Gaiman
title: Anansi Boys

quote: Love doesn’t have to be on Valentine’s Day. It doesn’t have to be by the time you turn eighteen or thirty-three or fifty-nine. It doesn’t have to conform to whatever is usual. It doesn’t have to be kismet at once, or rhapsody by the third day.  It just has to be. In time. In place. In spirt.  It just has to be.
author: David Levithan
title: How They Met, and Other Stories

quote: Is there any real purpose in being alive if all we are going to do is get up every day and live only for ourselves? Live your life to help others. Give & live selflessly.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Create your own miracles; do what you think you cannot do.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: We have no right to express an opinion until we know all of the answers.
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: You ask, what is our aim? I can answer in one word. It is victory, victory at all costs, victory in spite of all terror, victory, however long and hard the road may be; for without victory, there is no survival.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: If you want to catch beasts you don't see every day, You have to go places quite out of the way, You have to go places no others can get to. You have to get cold and you have too get wet, too.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: My hope still is to leave the world a bit better than when I got here.
author: Jim Henson

quote: Give your weakness to one who helps.
author: Rumi

quote: You don't know, oh, oh You don't know you're beautiful.
author: One Direction

quote: Hanya orang-orang dengan hati damailah yang boleh menerima kejadian buruk dengan lega.
author: Tere Liye
title: Rembulan Tenggelam Di Wajahmu

quote: Maybe I made a mistake yesterday, but yesterday’s me is still me. I am who I am today, with all my faults. Tomorrow I might be a tiny bit wiser, and that’s me, too. These faults and mistakes are what I am, making up the brightest stars in the constellation of my life. I have come to love myself for who I was, who I am, and who I hope to become.
author: Kim Namjoong

quote: Dead yesterdays and unborn tomorrows, why fret about it, if today be sweet.
author: Omar Khayyâm

quote: Some people try to tell you the things you want in life are out of your grasp, while others lift you up on their shoulders and help you reach them. I may not know a lot, but I prefer to fill my life with people who let me climb on top of their shoulders, not people who try to keep me planted on the ground.
author: Katie Kacvinsky
title: Awaken

quote: I realized it for the first time in my life: there is nothing but mystery in the world, how it hides behind the fabric of our poor, browbeat days, shining brightly, and we don't even know it.
author: Sue Monk Kidd
title: The Secret Life of Bees

quote: And by and by Christopher Robin came to the end of things, and he was silent, and he sat there, looking out over the world, just wishing it wouldn't stop.
author: A.A. Milne
title: The House at Pooh Corner

quote: Life is at its best when everything has fallen out of place, and you decide that you're going to fight to get them right, not when everything is going your way and everyone is praising you.
author: Thisuri Wanniarachchi

quote: You must understand: they fear you. There is nothing scarier in their minds than a girl who knows the power of her flames.
author: Nikita Gill

quote: He who binds to himself a joy Does the winged life destroy; But he who kisses the joy as it flies Lives in eternity's sun rise.
author: William Blake

quote: feminism is for everybody
author: bell hooks

quote: Great acts are made up of small deeds.
author: Lao-Tzu

quote: Do you not then hear this horrible scream all around you that people usually call silence.
author: Werner Herzog

quote: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, Who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous? Actually, who are you not to be?
author: Marianne Williamson
title: A Return to Love: Reflections on the Principles of "A Course in Miracles"

quote: There is force in the universe, which, if we permit it, will flow through us and produce miraculous results.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Of life's two chief prizes, beauty and truth, I found the first in a loving heart and the second in a laborer's hand.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: I want a tattoo over my heart that reads TRY HARDER YOU LAZY PARAMEDIC SHITBAG OR I WILL HAUNT YOUR BEDROOM FOREVER
author: Warren Ellis

quote: Do you have to make me feel like there's nothing left of me? You can take everything I have, you can break everything I am, like I am made of glass, like I am made of paper.Go on and try to tear me down I will be rising from the ground like a Skyscraper...
author: Demi Lovato

quote: When you chase a dream, you learn about yourself. You learn your capabilities and limitations, and the value of hard work and persistence.
author: Nicholas Sparks
title: Three Weeks With My Brother

quote: if you don't have peace, it isn't because someone took it from you; you gave it away. You cannot always control what happens to you, but you can control what happens in you.
author: John C. Maxwell
title: Be a People Person

quote: You tried to help the people of the market. You mostly failed. This is life. The longer you live, the more you fail. Failure is the mark of a life well lived. In turn, the only way to live without failure is to be of no use to anyone. Trust me, I've practiced
author: Brandon Sanderson
title: Oathbringer

quote: You have to teach your heart and mind how to sing together... then you'll hear the sound of your soul
author: Renee Carlino
title: Sweet Thing

quote: All paths are present, always... and we can but choose among them.
author: Jacqueline Carey
title: Kushiel's Chosen

quote: When we are most alone is when we embrace another's loneliness.
author: Mitch Albom
title: The Time Keeper

quote: Successful people don't have fewer problems. They have determined that nothing will stop them from going forward.
author: Ben Carson
title: Gifted Hands: The Ben Carson Story

quote: Each of us is full of shit in our own special way. We are all shitty little snowflakes dancing in the universe.
author: Lewis Black
title: Me of Little Faith

quote: Teach her that the idea of 'gender roles' is absolute nonsense. Do not ever tell her that she should or should not do something because she is a girl.  'Because you are a girl' is never reason for anything.  Ever.
author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
title: Dear Ijeawele, or a Feminist Manifesto in Fifteen Suggestions

quote: Nite Owl II: But the country's disintegrating. What's happened to America? What's happened to the American dream?  The Comedian: It came true. You're lookin' at it.
author: Alan Moore
title: Watchmen

quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
author: Les Brown

quote: If you would not be forgotten, as soon as you are dead and rotten, either write things worth reading, or do things worth writing.
author: Benjamin Franklin
title: Poor Richard's Almanack

quote: For the future, the motto is, "No days unalert.
author: Robert Greene
title: The 48 Laws of Power

quote: We are at our most powerful the moment we no longer need to be powerful.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Life is very short, and there's no time for fussing and fighting my friends
author: John Lennon

quote: Yet he who reigns within himself, and rules Passions, desires, and fears, is more a king.
author: John Milton
title: Paradise Regained

quote: Real courage is doing the right thing when nobody's looking. Doing the unpopular thing because it's what you believe, and the heck with everybody.
author: Justin Cronin
title: The Summer Guest

quote: Sometimes letting go is simply changing the labels you place on an event. Looking at the same event with fresh eyes.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: The shell must break before the bird can fly.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Don't lose heart if it's very difficult at times, everything will come out all right and nobody can in the beginning do as he wishes.
author: Vincent Willem van Gogh
title: The Letters of Vincent van Gogh

quote: Genius is eternal patience.
author: Michelangelo Buonarroti

quote: They alone live, who live for others.
author: Vivekananda

quote: A rose by any other name would smell as sweet.
author: William Shakespeare
title: Romeo and Juliet

quote: If you want to change the fruits, you will first have to change the roots. If you want to change the visible, you must first change the invisible.
author: T. Harv Eker
title: Secrets of the Millionaire Mind: Mastering the Inner Game of Wealth

quote: she was glad she had been scarred. She said that whoever loved her now would love her true self, and not her pretty face.
author: Cassandra Clare
title: Clockwork Angel

quote: Write to please just one person. If you open a window and make love to the world, so to speak, your story will get pneumonia.
author: Kurt Vonnegut
title: Bagombo Snuff Box

quote: Don't forget, a person's greatest emotional need is to feel appreciated.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
title: Life's Little Instruction Book: 511 Suggestions, Observations, and Reminders on How to Live a Happy and Rewarding Life

quote: Only two things can reveal life's great secrets: suffering and love.
author: Paulo Coelho
title: Aleph

quote: Muscles aching to work, minds aching to create - this is man.
author: John Steinbeck
title: The Grapes of Wrath

quote: There are several ways to react to being lost. One is to panic: this was usually Valentina's first impulse. Another is to abandon yourself to lostness, to allow the fact that you've misplaced yourself to change the way you experience the world.
author: Audrey Niffenegger
title: Her Fearful Symmetry

quote: People trust their eyes above all else - but most people see what they wish to see, or what they believe they should see; not what is really there
author: Zoë Marriott
title: Shadows on the Moon

quote: Understanding is the reward of faith. Therefore, seek not to understand that you may believe, but believe that you may understand.
author: St. Augustine of Hippo

quote: Miracles do not, in fact, break the laws of nature.
author: C.S. Lewis
title: Miracles

quote: Your need for acceptance can make you invisible in this world. Don't let anything stand in the way of the light that shines through this form. Risk being seen in all of your glory.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers. You can do anything you decide to do. You can act to change and control your life; and the procedure, the process is its own reward.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: When the world pushes you to your knees, you're in the perfect position to pray
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: A lot of people have gone further than they thought they could because someone else thought they could
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Why should we tolerate a diet of weak poisons, a home in insipid surroundings, a circle of acquaintances who are not quite our enemies, the noise of motors with just enough relief to prevent insanity? Who would want to live in a world which is just not quite fatal?
author: Rachel Carson
title: Silent Spring

quote: That is the hardest thing of all. It is much harder to judge yourself than to judge others. If you succeed in judging yourself, it's because you're truly a wise man.
author: Antoine de Saint Exupéry

quote: Some people insist that 'mediocre' is better than 'best.' They delight in clipping wings because they themselves can't fly. They despise brains because they have none.
author: Robert A. Heinlein
title: Have Space Suit—Will Travel

quote: My love is something valuable to me which I ought not to throw away without reflection.
author: Sigmund Freud
title: Civilization and Its Discontents

quote: When those you love die, the best you can do is honor their spirit for as long as you live. You make a commitment that you're going to take whatever lesson that person or animal was trying to teach you, and you make it true in your own life... it's a positive way to keep their spirit alive in the world, by keeping it alive in yourself.
author: Patrick Swayze
title: The Time of My Life

quote: Confine yourself to the present.
author: Marcus Aurelius
title: Meditations

quote: Blessed are the weird people:  poets, misfits, writers mystics, painters, troubadours for they teach us to see the world through different eyes.
author: Jacob Nordby
title: Pearls of Wisdom: 30 Inspirational Ideas to live your best life now

quote: and i said to my body. softly. ‘i want to be your friend.’ it took a long breath. and replied ‘i have been waiting my whole life for this.
author: Nayyirah Waheed

quote: And the fox said to the little prince: men have forgotten this truth, but you must not forget it. You become responsible, forever, for what you have tamed.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Loyalty and obedience to wisdom and justice are fine; but it is still finer to defy arbitrary power, unjustly and cruelly used--not on behalf of ourselves, but on behalf of others more helpless.
author: Elizabeth Gaskell
title: North and South

quote: When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe, then you'll be successful.
author: Eric Thomas
title: The Secret to Success

quote: Small is the number of them that see with their own eyes and feel with their own hearts.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: There is a road from the eye to the heart that does not go through the intellect.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: Push yourself to do more and to experience more. Harness your energy to start expanding your dreams. Yes, expand your dreams. Don't accept a life of mediocrity when you hold such infinite potential within the fortress of your mind. Dare to tap into your greatness.
author: Robin S. Sharma
title: The Monk Who Sold His Ferrari: A Fable About Fulfilling Your Dreams and Reaching Your Destiny

quote: Believe me, It would be better if we didn't meet again. Go back to school. Go back to your life. And next time they ask you, say no. Killing is for grown-ups and you're still a child.
author: Anthony Horowitz
title: Stormbreaker

quote: Truth builds trust.
author: Marilyn Suttle

quote: I don't look for love. Love looks for me." "Why?" "Because it needs me. Because I'm not afraid of it.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Do more than belong: participate. Do more than care: help. Do more than believe: practice. Do more than be fair: be kind. Do more than forgive: forget. Do more than dream: work.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: When you are used to the kind of life -of never getting anything you want- you stop knowing what it is you want.
author: Haruki Murakami
title: The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle

quote: I am larger, better than I thought; I did not know I held so much goodness.  All seems beautiful to me.  Whoever denies me, it shall not trouble me;	 Whoever accepts me, he or she shall be blessed, and shall bless me.
author: Walt Whitman
title: Leaves of Grass

quote: There is no such thing as a child who hates to read; there are only children who have not found the right book.
author: Frank Serafini

quote: आयुष्यात मला भावलेलं एक गुज सांगतो. उपजिविकेसाठीआवश्यक असणाऱ्या विषयाचं शिक्षण जरुर घ्या. पोटापाण्याचा उद्योग जिद्दीनं करा, पण एवढ्यावरच थांबू नका. साहित्य, चित्र, संगीत, नाट्य, शिल्प, खेळ ह्यांतल्या एखाद्या तरी कलेशी मैत्री जमवा. पोटापाण्याचा उद्योग तुम्हाला जगवील, पण कलेशी जमलेली मैत्री तुम्ही का जगायचं हे सांगून जाईल. - पु. ल.
author: Purushottam Laxman Deshpande

quote: Ends are for yesterday, not tomorrows.
author: Mitch Albom
title: The Time Keeper

quote: She was like the sun,  She knew her place in the world -  She would shine again regardless  of all the storms and changeable weather  She wouldn't adjust her purpose  for things that pass.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John R Wooden

quote: I close my eyes   and I can see a better day.   I close my eyes   and pray
author: Justin Bieber

quote: be it peace or happiness let it enfold you
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: But I will not run. I wouldn't be standing here if I'd quit every time something seemed impossible to overcome. I will not die today.
author: Rebecca Yarros
title: Fourth Wing

quote: Life is fragile and temporary. The faces of today quickly become the faces of the past. Sorrow, pain, and anger... it all fades-  except love. Love is forever and there after, even when we've fallen to our graves.
author: Lee Argus

quote: Until you have suffered much in your heart, you cannot learn humility.
author: Elder Thaddeus of Vitovnica
title: Our Thoughts Determine Our Lives:  The Life and Teachings of Elder Thaddeus of Vitovnica

quote: ... what you learn today, for no reason at all, will help you discover all the wonderful secrets of tomorrow.
author: Norton Juster
title: The Phantom Tollbooth

quote: A daily dose of daydreaming heals the heart, soothes the soul, and strengthens the imagination.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich
title: Smile Anyway: Quotes, Verse, and Grumblings for Every Day of the Year

quote: I am not afraid... I was born to do this.
author: Joan of Arc

quote: People will always have opinions about your decision because they're not courageous enough to take action on their opinion.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: If I lived a million lives, I would've felt a million feelings and I still would've fallen a million times for you.
author: robert m drake

quote: At times our own light goes out and is rekindled by a spark from another person. Each of us has cause to think with deep gratitude of those who have lighted the flame within us.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Live authentically. Why would you continue to compromise something that's beautiful to create something that is fake?
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: It is foolish to tear one’s hair in grief, as though sorrow would be made less by baldness.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: In definitiv, cu cat vei ridica un zid mai inalt in jurul tau cu atat va fi mai bun cel care-l va sari.
author: Tudor Chirilă
title: Exerciţii de echilibru

quote: As the smoke clears, I awaken, And untangle you from me. Would it make you feel better To watch me, while I bleed? All my windows still are broken, But I'm standing on my feet.
author: Demi Lovato

quote: What the mind can conceive and believe, and the heart desire, you can achieve.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: I am a strong believer in the tyranny, the dictatorship, the absolute authority of the writer.
author: Philip Pullman

quote: Gratitude is a sign of maturity...Where there is appreciation: there is also courtesy and concern for the rights and property of others.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Quietly endure, silently suffer and patiently wait.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.
title: Why We Can't Wait

quote: Never apologize for burning too brightly or collapsing into yourself every night. That is how galaxies are made.
author: Tyler Kent White

quote: I understood what he was doing, that he had spent four years fulfilling the absurd and tedious duty of graduating from college and now he was emancipated from that world of abstraction, false security, parents, and material excess.
author: Jon Krakauer
title: Into the Wild

quote: Anyone who is steady in his determination for the advanced stage of spiritual realization and can equally tolerate the onslaughts of distress and happiness is certainly a person eligible for liberation.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada
title: The Bhagavad-gita

quote: Never give up.  It's like breathing—once you quit, your flame dies letting total darkness extinguish every last gasp of hope. You can't do that. You must continue taking in even the shallowest of breaths, continue putting forth even the smallest of efforts to sustain your dreams. Don't ever, ever, ever give up.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich
title: Smile Anyway: Quotes, Verse, and Grumblings for Every Day of the Year

quote: But what is life if you don't live it?
author: James Patterson
title: Suzanne's Diary for Nicholas

quote: To save all we must risk all.
author: Friedrich von Schiller
title: Fiesco; or, the Genoese Conspiracy

quote: When someone is trying very hard to get something, they don't. And when they're running away from something as hard as they can, it usually catches up with them.
author: Haruki Murakami
title: Kafka on the Shore

quote: Madness and chaos are self-destructing but over thinking is the suicide.
author: robert m drake

quote: I only hope that we never lose sight of one thing — that it was all started by a mouse.
author: Walt Disney Company

quote: Our Age of Anxiety is, in great part, the result of trying to do today’s jobs with yesterday’s tools!
author: Marshall McLuhan

quote: In the end, everything is a gag.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: The summit of happiness is reached when a person is ready to be what he is.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: What is a Wanderess? Bound by no boundaries, contained by no countries, tamed by no time, she is the force of nature’s course.
author: Roman Payne
title: The Wanderess

quote: A man, to be greatly good, must imagine intensely and comprehensively; he must put himself in the place of another and many others; the pains and pleasures of his species must become his own. The great instrument of moral good is the imagination.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley
title: A Defence of Poetry and Other Essays

quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you..
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Keep your dreams, you never know when you might need them.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón
title: The Shadow of the Wind

quote: If you set yourself to it, you can live the same life, rich or poor. You can keep on with your books and your ideas. You just got to say to yourself, "I'm a free man in here" - he tapped his forehead - "and you're all right.
author: George Orwell
title: Down and Out in Paris and London

quote: Your life is a print-out of your thoughts.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Patience ensures victory.
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: Imagine others complexly.
author: John Green
title: Paper Towns

quote: You can’t save anyone who wouldn’t save themselves without you. It’s the hardest lesson to learn in life, take it from me.
author: Marc Jampole

quote: In order to write the book you want to write, in the end you have to become the person you need to become to write that book.
author: Junot Diaz

quote: Life did not stop, and one had to live.
author: Leo Tolstoy
title: War and Peace

quote: Work is love made visible. And if you can't work with love, but only with distaste, it is better that you should leave your work and sit at the gate of the temple and take alms of the people who work with joy
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: We are what we believe we are!
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: You can't do anything about the length of your life, but you can do something about its width and depth.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Maybe we shouldn't be looking for love. Maybe we should be looking for a person. Because maybe you can find love in a person, but not have that person. So if you look for love, what you will find is love. But if you want to belong to someone, and you want someone to belong to you, you should look for a person.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: We have been called to heal wounds, to unite what has fallen apart, and to bring home those who have lost their way.
author: St. Francis of Assisi

quote: You lose nothing when fighting for a cause ... In my mind the losers are those who don't have a cause they care about.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Having an eye for beauty isn't the same thing as a weakness...except possibly when it comes to you.
author: Suzanne Collins

quote: Arise, awake, stop not till the goal is reached.
author: Vivekananda
title: Meditation and Its Methods : According to Swami Vivekananda + Fear Not Be Strong + Personality Development + Powers of the Mind

quote: You can't go home again
author: Thomas Wolfe

quote: when you don't create things, you become defined by your tastes rather than ability. your tastes only narrow & exclude people. so create.
author: Why The Lucky Stiff

quote: The world is wide, and I will not waste my life in friction when it could be turned into momentum.
author: Frances Willard

quote: Yet there are moments when the walls of the mind grow thin; when nothing is unabsorbed, and I could fancy that we might blow so vast a bubble that the sun might set and rise in it and we might take the blue of midday and the black of midnight and be cast off and escape from here and now.
author: Virginia Woolf
title: The Waves

quote: Do your work, then step back. The only path to serenity.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Can't stand all these poisonous creatures, all these snakes and insects and fish and things. Wretched things, biting everybody. And then people expect me to tell them what to do about it. I'll tell them what to do. Don't get bitten in the first place. (quoting Dr. Struan Sutherland)
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Every time I thought I was being rejected from something good, I was actually being re-directed to something better.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Happiness is pretty simple: someone to love, something to do, something to look forward to.
author: Rita Mae Brown
title: Hiss of Death

quote: It is one of the beautiful compensations of life that no man can sincerely try to help another without helping himself.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than one with all the facts.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
title: Life's Little Instruction Book: 511 Suggestions, Observations, and Reminders on How to Live a Happy and Rewarding Life

quote: Heaven wheels above you, displaying to you her eternal glories, and still your eyes are on the ground
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: We all have the same beginning - birth - and we all have the same end - death. So how different can we be?
author: Mitch Albom
title: Tuesdays with Morrie

quote: All young people, regardless of sexual orientation or identity, deserve a safe and supportive environment in which to achieve their full potential.
author: Harvey Milk

quote: Once your mindset changes, everything on the outside will change along with it.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: My experiences have taught me that things rarely improve with a simple change of scenery.
author: Pittacus Lore
title: The Power of Six

quote: Nothing but a symbol? People die for symbols. People have hope because of symbols. They're not just lines. They're histories, cultures, traditions, given shape.
author: Roshani Chokshi
title: The Gilded Wolves

quote: Go out in the woods, go out. If you don't go out in the woods nothing will ever happen and your life will never begin.
author: Clarissa Pinkola Estés
title: Women Who Run With the Wolves

quote: Status quo, you know, is Latin for 'the mess we're in'.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Spend the afternoon, you can't take it with you.
author: Annie Dillard

quote: Only when I fall do I get up again.
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: Pressure makes diamonds
author: George S. Patton Jr.

quote: What a wonderful life I’ve had! I only wish I’d realized it sooner.
author: Colette

quote: and here you are living despite it all
author: Rupi Kaur
title: the sun and her flowers

quote: Avoid loud and aggressive persons, they are vexations to the spirit.
author: Max Ehrmann
title: Desiderata: A Poem for a Way of Life

quote: Without a sense of identity, there can be no real struggle.
author: Paulo Freire
title: Pedagogy of the Oppressed

quote: A graceful refusal is better than a lengthy promise.
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: Tomorrow belongs to those who can hear it coming
author: David Bowie

quote: Where your treasure is, there will your heart be also
author: J.K. Rowling
title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: The first and best victory is to conquer self
author: Plato

quote: Criticism - however valid or intellectually engaging - tends to get in the way of a writer who has anything personal to say. A tightrope walker may require practice, but if he starts a theory of equilibrium he will lose grace (and probably fall off).
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
title: The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore
author: André Gide

quote: To be deeply loved, means a willingness to cut yourself wide open, exposing your vulnerabilities... hopes, hurts, fears and flaws. Hiding behind the highlight reel of who you are, is the real you and that person is just as worthy of love. There is nothing more terrifying or fulfilling, than complete love, it's worth the risk... reach for it.
author: Jaeda DeWalt

quote: Day, the champion of the people, the one who can't bear to see those around him suffer on his behalf, who would gladly give his life for those he loves.
author: Marie Lu
title: Champion

quote: Love has no limitations. It cannot be measured. It has no boundaries. Although many have tried, love is indefinable.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: the moment you don't feel like praying, get on your knees. And the moment you don't feel like reading your bible, you'd better get that Book open.
author: Lori Wick
title: Where the Wild Rose Blooms

quote: To ugly ducklings everywhere, Don't worry about those fluffy yellow morons: They'll never get to be swans
author: Zoë Marriott
title: The Swan Kingdom

quote: Beauty is not who you are on the outside, it is the wisdom and time you gave away to save another struggling soul like you.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
author: Walter Bagehot

quote: Every person has a right to risk their own life for the preservation of it.
author: Jean Jacques Rousseau

quote: know what you want, work to get it, then value it once you have it.
author: Nora Roberts
title: Morrigan's Cross

quote: You are a cosmic flower. Om chanting is the process of opening the psychic petals of that flower.
author: Amit Ray
title: Om Chanting and Meditation

quote: Quit being so hard on yourself. We are what we are; we love what we love. We don't need to justify it to anyone... not even to ourselves.
author: Scott Lynch
title: The Republic of Thieves

quote: I would court you, with all the grace and courtesy that you deserve,
author: C.S. Pacat
title: Kings Rising

quote: Do not yearn to be popular; be exquisite. Do not desire to be famous; be loved. Do not take pride in being expected; be palpable, unmistakable.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: You are beautiful. Know this. Anyone who tells you otherwise is simply lying. You are beautiful.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Making others happy, through kindness of speech and sincerity of right advice, is a sign of true greatness. To hurt another soul by sarcastic words, looks, or suggestions, is despicable.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda
title: "Where There is Light (Self-Realization Fellowship)"

quote: If you are still breathing maybe it is not such a bad day after all...
author: Darren E. Laws

quote: The truth is I didn’t need therapy; I just needed to feel loved and know that someone out there craved my attention.
author: robert m drake

quote: Every beginning has an end and every end is a new beginning.
author: Santosh Kalwar
title: Quote Me Everyday

quote: It is a very natural human trait to destroy that which frightens us.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton
title: Guilty Pleasures

quote: If you always attach positive emotions to the things you want, and never attach negative emotions to the things you don't, then that which you desire most will invariably come your way.
author: Matt D. Miller

quote: I'd rather die while I'm living than live while I'm dead.
author: Jimmy Buffett

quote: You become mature when you become the authority of your own life.
author: Joseph Campbell
title: A Joseph Campbell Companion: Reflections on the Art of Living

quote: Small-minded people blame others. Average people blame themselves. The wise see all blame as foolishness
author: Epictetus

quote: Again and again I will suffer; again and again I will get back on my feet. I will not be defeated. I won't let my spirit be destroyed.
author: Banana Yoshimoto
title: Kitchen

quote: Love was that way. You could not render it in black or white. It always came down to the strange, blended shades of grey.
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: A young outcast will often feel that there is something wrong with himself, but as he gets older, grows more confident in who he is, he will adapt, he will begin to feel that there is something wrong with everyone else.
author: Criss Jami
title: Killosophy

quote: They say that every snowflake is different. If that were true, how could the world go on? How could we ever get up off our knees? How could we ever recover from the wonder of it?
author: Jeanette Winterson

quote: In the beginner’s mind there are many possibilities, but in the expert’s there are few
author: Shunryu Suzuki
title: Zen Mind, Beginner's Mind: Informal Talks on Zen Meditation and Practice

quote: To be kind, honest and have positive thoughts; to forgive those who harm us and treat everyone as a friend; to help those who are suffering and never to consider ourselves superior to anyone else: even if this advice seems rather simplistic, make the effort of seeing whether by following it you can find greater happiness.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: The true miracle lies in our eagerness to allow, appreciate, and honor the uniqueness, and freedom of each sentient being to sing the song of their heart.
author: Amit Ray
title: Meditation: Insights and Inspirations

quote: There is only one day left, always starting over: It is given to us at dawn and taken away from us at dusk.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Make every effort to change things you do not like. If you cannot make a change, change the way you have been thinking. You might find a new solution.
author: Maya Angelou
title: Letter to My Daughter

quote: Grace is what picks me up and lifts my wings high above and I fly! Grace always conquers! Be graceful in everything; in anger, in sadness, in joy, in kindness, in unkindness, retain grace with you!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Fairness does not mean everyone gets the same. Fairness means everyone gets what they need.
author: Rick Riordan
title: The Red Pyramid

quote: Your opinion is not my reality.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: I've done my best, and I begin to understand what is meant by 'the joy of strife'. Next to trying and winning, the best thing is trying and failing.
author: L.M. Montgomery
title: Anne of Green Gables

quote: She is delightfully chaotic; a beautiful mess. Loving her is a splendid adventure.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: errare humanum est, sed perseverare diabolicum: 'to err is human, but to persist (in the mistake) is diabolical.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: We all can be only who we are, no more, no less.
author: Terry Goodkind
title: Stone of Tears

quote: Change happens when the pain of staying the same is greater than the pain of change.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: You start by writing to live. You end by writing so as not to die.
author: Carlos Fuentes

quote: When you stop being afraid you feel good
author: Spencer Johnson
title: Who Moved My Cheese?

quote: If your life is worth thinking about,it is worth writing about.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Fear and realisation of ignorance, strong medicines against stupid pride.
author: Garth Nix
title: Sabriel

quote: Books fall open, you fall in
author: David McCord

quote: Things will change: you won't feel this way forever. And anyway, sometimes the hardest lessons to learn are the ones your soul needs most.
author: Kelly Cutrone
title: If You Have to Cry, Go Outside: And Other Things Your Mother Never Told You

quote: For what it's worth, I think happiness is a fleeting condition, not a permanent state of goddamn mind. I've learned that if you chase after moments of bliss here and there, sometimes those moments will sustain you through the shit.
author: Tiffanie DeBartolo
title: How to Kill a Rock Star

quote: The good thing about being old, is you don’t have to worry about dying young.
author: Stephen King
title: Doctor Sleep

quote: I have never felt that anything really mattered but knowing that you stood for the things in which you believed and had done the very best you could.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: If you are not the hero of your own story, then you're missing the whole point of your humanity.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: We join spokes together in a wheel,  but it is the center hole  that makes the wagon move.  We shape clay into a pot,  but it is the emptiness inside that holds whatever we want.  We hammer wood for a house,  but it is the inner space that makes it livable.  We work with being,  but non-being is what we use.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: ... it’s a blessed thing to love and feel loved in return.
author: E.A. Bucchianeri
title: Brushstrokes of a Gadfly,

quote: But what if Shakespeare― and Hamlet― were asking the wrong question? What if the real question is not whether to be, but how to be?
author: Gayle Forman
title: Just One Day

quote: Happiness comes when your work and words are of benefit to others.
author: Buddha

quote: A lot of the conflict you have in your life exists simply because you're not living in alignment; you're not be being true to yourself.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Read. Read anything. Read the things they say are good for you, and the things they claim are junk. You'll find what you need to find. Just read.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: the purpose of life is the life of purpose
author: Robin Sharma
title: The Monk Who Sold His Ferrari

quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed at some indefinite time in the future.
author: George S. Patton Jr.

quote: No matter what your history has been, your destiny is what you create today. What are you going to create?
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: What the society thinks is of no interest to me. All that's important is how I see myself. I know who who I am. I know the value of my work.
author: Robin Sharma
title: The Leader Who Had No Title: A Modern Fable on Real Success in Business and in

quote: How would your life be different if…You stopped validating your victim mentality? Let today be the day…You shake off your self-defeating drama and embrace your innate ability to recover and achieve.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: May the fleas of a thousand camels invade the crotch of the person that ruins your day. And may their arms be to short too scratch
author: Keisha Keenleyside

quote: I want to be free Michael, just for once in my whole life I want to be free"   "You are free. You just don't know it yet
author: Francine Rivers
title: Redeeming Love

quote: A photograph shouldn't be just a picture, it should be a philosophy.
author: Amit Kalantri
title: Wealth of Words

quote: You are a human with one life and its up to you to make it the best life you can.
author: Dan Howell

quote: 90% of the game is half mental.
author: Yogi Berra
title: The Yogi Book : I Really Didn't Say Everything I Said

quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
author: Yoko Ono
title: Grapefruit: A Book of Instructions and Drawings

quote: Adversity introduces a man to himself.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Inner peace is impossible without patience. Wisdom requires patience. Spiritual growth implies the mastery of patience. Patience allows the unfolding of destiny to proceed at its won unhurried pace.
author: Brian Weiss
title: Muchas Vidas, Muchos Maestros

quote: A rose can never be a sunflower, and a sunflower can never be a rose.All flowers are beautiful in their own way, and that’s like women too. I want to encourage women to embrace their own uniqueness.
author: Miranda Kerr

quote: Fear grew in places unlit by knowledge
author: Roshani Chokshi
title: The Gilded Wolves

quote: Pesimistik tidak lebih daripada sikap takbur mendahului nasib.
author: Andrea Hirata
title: Sang Pemimpi

quote: If you remember nothing else, remember this: Inspiration from outside one's self is like the heat in an oven. It makes passable Bath buns. But inspiration from within is like a volcano: It changes the face of the world.
