author: Alan Bradley
title: The Weed That Strings the Hangman's Bag

quote: Leaders are limited by their vision rather than by their abilities.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: The purpose of life is not to be happy—but to matter, to be productive, to be useful, to have it make some difference that you lived at all.
author: Leo Rosten

quote: Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk.
author: Robert Bloch

quote: You don't have to be great to get started, but you have to get started to be great.
author: Les Brown
title: The Power of Purpose

quote: I know I'm not going to be in your head all the time. But once you know me, I'll be forever in your heart.
author: Crystal Woods
title: Write like no one is reading

quote: Don't bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.
author: William Faulkner

quote: Boredom can be a lethal thing on a small island.
author: Christopher Moore
title: Island Sequined Love Nun

quote: Make your interactions with people transformational, not just transactional.
author: Patti Smith

quote: The less you reveal, the more people can wonder.
author: Emma Watson

quote: We are constantly invited to be what we are.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The greatest blessing granted to mankind come by way of madness, which is a divine gift.
author: Socrates

quote: When you are living the best version of yourself, you inspire others to live the best versions of themselves.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: I should have learned this, she thought. I wanted to learn fire, and pain, but I should have learned people.
author: Terry Pratchett
title: I Shall Wear Midnight

quote: Dancing in all its forms cannot be excluded from the curriculum of all noble education; dancing with the feet, with ideas, with words, and, need I add that one must also be able to dance with the pen?
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: You will have to make up for the smallness of your size by your courage and selfless devotion to duty, for it is not life that matters, but the courage, fortitude and determination you bring to it.
author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: There's no point in wishing. We can't change anything about the past. We can only remember. We can only move forward.
author: Emily X.R. Pan
title: The Astonishing Color of After

quote: Me, I want to bloody kick this moronic bloody world in the bloody teeth over and over till it bloody understands that not hurting people is ten bloody thousand times more bloody important than being right.
author: David Mitchell
title: Black Swan Green

quote: Total paranoia is just total awareness.
author: Charles Manson

quote: Distance was a dangerous thing, she knew. Distance changed people.
author: Rohinton Mistry
title: A Fine Balance

quote: Life is 10 percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Happiness is a state of mind, a choice, a way of living; it is not something to be achieved, it is something to be experienced.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: The book was turned to the page with Anne Frank's name, but what got me about it was the fact that right beneath her name there were four Aron Franks. FOUR. Four Aron Franks without museums, without historical markers, without anyone to mourn them. I silently resolved to remember and pray for the four Aron Franks as long as I was around.
author: John Green
title: The Fault in Our Stars

quote: It's okay to be a loser, it just depends on how good you are at being one.
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: If you care about someone enough, you’ll always be there for them no matter what.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: For the world is in a bad state, but everything will become still worse unless each of us does his best.
author: Viktor E. Frankl
title: Man's Search for Meaning

quote: Undisturbed calmness of mind is attained by cultivating friendliness toward the happy, compassion for the unhappy, delight in the virtuous, and indifference toward the wicked.
author: Patanjali
title: The Yoga Sutras of Patanjali

quote: Libraries store the energy that fuels the imagination. They open up windows to the world and inspire us to explore and achieve, and contribute to improving our quality of life. Libraries change lives for the better.
author: Sidney Sheldon

quote: Many people pray to be kept out of unexpected problems.  Some people pray to be able to confront and overcome them.
author: Toba Beta [Betelgeuse Incident]
title: Betelgeuse Incident: Insiden Bait Al-Jauza

quote: Integrity is doing what is right and truthful, and doing as you say you would do.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Fortune does favor the bold and you'll never know what you're capable of if you don't try.
author: Sheryl Sandberg
title: Lean In: Women, Work, and the Will to Lead

quote: I’d tell men and women in their midtwenties not to settle for a job or a profession or even a career. Seek a calling. Even if you don’t know what that means, seek it. If you’re following your calling, the fatigue will be easier to bear, the disappointments will be fuel, the highs will be like nothing you’ve ever felt.
author: Phil Knight
title: Shoe Dog: A Memoir by the Creator of Nike

quote: Don't turn over the rocks if you don't want to see the pale creatures who live under them.
author: Janet Fitch
title: White Oleander

quote: My goal is this: always to put myself in the place in which I am best able to serve, wherever my gifts and qualities find the best soil to grow, the widest field of action. There is no other goal.
author: Hermann Hesse
title: Narcissus and Goldmund

quote: It is better to live one day as a lion than 100 years as a sheep.
author: Benito Mussolini

quote: He who speaks without an attentive ear is mute.
author: Stephen King
title: The Dark Tower

quote: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.
author: Les Brown

quote: I wish I could make him understand that a loving good heart is riches enough, and that without it intellect is poverty.
author: Mark Twain
title: The Diaries of Adam and Eve

quote: I attribute my success to this:—I never gave or took an excuse.
author: Florence Nightingale

quote: Man is a being in search of meaning.
author: Plato

quote: It had never occurred to me that our lives, which had been so closely interwoven, could unravel with such speed.
author: Kazuo Ishiguro

quote: All I have is all I need and all I need is all I have in this moment.
author: Byron Katie

quote: Fear not the path of Truth for the lack of People walking on it.
author: Robert F. Kennedy

quote: Some want to live within the sound Of church or chapel bell; I want to run a rescue shop, Within a yard of hell.
author: C.T. Studd

quote: Become the leader of your life. Lead yourself to where you want to be. Breathe life back into your ambitions, your desires, your goals, your relationships.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: You don't always have to kiss a lot of frogs to recognize a prince when you find one   -Henrietta Barett
author: Julia Quinn
title: Minx

quote: Courage to me is doing something daring, no matter how afraid, insecure, intimidated, alone, unworthy, incapable, ridiculed or whatever other paralyzing emotion you might feel. Courage is taking action....no matter what.  So you're afraid? Be afraid.  Be scared silly to the point you're trembling and nauseous, but do it anyway!
author: Richelle E. Goodrich
title: Smile Anyway: Quotes, Verse, and Grumblings for Every Day of the Year

quote: The heart of wisdom is tolerance.
author: Steven Erikson
title: Memories of Ice

quote: You can't change the wind but you can set your sails.
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: Be yourself. Don't worry about what other people are thinking of you, because they're probably feeling the same kind of scared, horrible feelings that everyone does.
author: Phil Lester

quote: Those who travel to mountain-tops are half in love with themselves, and half in love with oblivion.
author: Robert Macfarlane
title: Mountains of the Mind: A History of a Fascination

quote: You are old beyond your years Zoeybird. Believe in yourself and you will find a way. But remember darkness does not always equate to evil just like light does not always bring good.
author: P.C. Cast
title: Marked

quote: After all, if you do not resist the apparently inevitable, you will never know how inevitable the inevitable was.
author: Terry Eagleton
title: Why Marx Was Right

quote: Most don't deserve your tears... and the ones that do will never make you cry.
author: T. Rafael Cimino
title: Table 21

quote: Scars show us where we have been, they do not dictate where we are going.
author: David Rossi

quote: May my heart be kind, my mind fierce, and my spirit brave.
author: Kate Forsyth
title: The Witches of Eileanan

quote: If freedom is short of weapons, we must compensate with willpower.
author: Adolf Hitler

quote: And I think that's what our world is desperately in need of - lovers, people who are building deep, genuine relationships with fellow strugglers along the way, and who actually know the faces of the people behind the issues they are concerned about.
author: Shane Claiborne
title: The Irresistible Revolution: Living as an Ordinary Radical

quote: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Don't feel stupid if you don't like what everyone else pretends to love.
author: Emma Watson

quote: Yet, even amidst the hatred and carnage, life is still worth living. It is possible for wonderful encounters and beautiful things to exist.
author: Hayao Miyazaki

quote: Were I a Roman Catholic, perhaps I should on this occasion vow to build a chapel to some saint, but as I am not, if I were to vow at all, it should be to build a light-house.  [Letter to his wife, 17 July 1757, after narrowly avoiding a shipwreck; often misquoted as "Lighthouses are more helpful than churches."]
author: Benjamin Franklin
title: Memoirs of the Life and Writings of Benjamin Franklin Volume 2

quote: If an apology is followed by an excuse or a reason, it means they are going to commit same mistake again they just apologized for.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: There is no such thing as a great talent without great willpower.
author: Honoré de Balzac

quote: A sailor chooses the wind that takes the ship from a safe port. Ah, yes, but once you're abroad, as you have seen, winds have a mind of their own. Be careful, Charlotte, careful of the wind you choose.
author: Avi
title: The True Confessions of Charlotte Doyle

quote: If you hear how wonderful you are often enough, you begin to believe it, no matter how you try to resist it.
author: Ben Carson

quote: Loneliness and the feeling of being unwanted is the most terrible poverty.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Nobody ever lives their life all the way up except bullfighters.
author: Ernest Hemingway
title: The Sun Also Rises

quote: Be compassionate ... and take responsibility for each other. If we only learned those lessons, this world would be a better place.
author: Mitch Albom
title: Tuesdays with Morrie

quote: That's why I'm sorry. I'm sorry because you shouldn't have to be everything to me. I had you, but I'd forgotten that I had myself too. It's a new feeling, something I'm getting used to.
author: Marie Lu
title: Champion

quote: Holding a grudge & harboring anger/resentment is poison to the soul. Get even with people...but not those who have hurt us, forget them, instead get even with those who have helped us.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: There is no wealth like knowledge, no poverty like ignorance.
author: Ali Bin Abi Thalib

quote: Choices, numberless as grains of sand, had layered and compressed, coalescing into sediment, then into rock, until all was set in stone.
author: Tara Westover
title: Educated

quote: Kung matatakot kang harapin ang totoo at sabihin ang talagang nararamdaman mo dahil baka masaktan ka, isa lang ibig sabihin noon: ipinagkait mo na sa sarili mo ang pagiging masaya at kinarir mo ang magpakatanga.
author: bob ong

quote: You have a unique gift to offer this world. Be true to yourself, be kind to yourself, read and learn about everything that interests you and keep away from people who bring you down. When you treat yourself kindly and respect the uniqueness of those around you, you will be giving this world an amazing gift... YOU!
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: As for what it's against - the story is against those who pervert and misuse religion, or any other kind of doctrine with a holy book and a priesthood and an apparatus of power that wields unchallengeable authority, in order to dominate and suppress human freedoms.
author: Philip Pullman
title: His Dark Materials

quote: What I’ve realized is that life doesn’t count for much unless you’re willing to do your small part to leave our children — all of our children — a better world. Any fool can have a child. That doesn’t make you a father. It’s the courage to raise a child that makes you a father.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Though we tremble before uncertain futures may we meet illness, death and adversity with strength may we dance in the face of our fears.
author: Gloria Anzaldúa

quote: If I am truly to become an autonomous woman, then I must take over that role of being my own guardian...I not only have to become my own husband, but I need to be my own father, too.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: Feel your emotions, Live true your passions, Keep still your mind.
author: Geoffrey M. Gluckman

quote: Courtesy costs nothing, but buys everything.
author: Hazrat Ali ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: Teachers are the one and only people who save nations.
author: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk

quote: Realize that true happiness lies within you. Waste no time and effort searching for peace and contentment and joy in the world outside. Remember that there is no happiness in having or in getting, but only in giving. Reach out. Share. Smile. Hug. Happiness is a perfume you cannot pour on others without getting a few drops on yourself.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Always ask yourself: "What will happen if I say nothing?
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Rogerson," I asked him sweetly as we sat watching a video in the pool house, "where would I find the pelagic zone?"  "In the open sea," he said. "Now shut up and eat your Junior Mints.
author: Sarah Dessen
title: Dreamland

quote: The trouble with fiction," said John Rivers, "is that it makes too much sense. Reality never makes sense.
author: Aldous Huxley
title: The Genius and the Goddess

quote: In imagination she sailed over storied seas that wash the distant shining shores of "faëry lands forlorn," where lost Atlantis and Elysium lie, with the evening star for pilot, to the land of Heart's Desire. And she was richer in those dreams than in realities; for things seen pass away, but the things that are unseen are eternal.
author: L.M. Montgomery
title: Anne of the Island

quote: With an eye made quiet by the power of harmony, and the deep power of joy, we see into the life of things.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: If gold rusts, what then can iron do?
author: Geoffrey Chaucer
title: The Canterbury Tales

quote: impossible is not a word
author: Obert Skye
title: Leven Thumps and the Gateway to Foo

quote: I am buoyant and expansive and uncontainable--but I always was so, only I never knew it!
author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni
title: The Palace of Illusions

quote: Buy a pup and your money will buy Love unflinching that cannot lie.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Love feels no burden, thinks nothing of its trouble, attempts what is above its strength, pleads no excuse for impossibility, for it thinks all things are lawful for itself and all things are possible
author: Thomas A. Kempis

quote: Be humble for you are made of earth. Be noble for you are made of stars.
author: Serbian Proverb

quote: There is no point in keeping vengeance or stubbornness. These things" -he sighed- "these things I so regret in my life. Pride. Vanity. Why do we do the things we do?  Morrie Schwartz
author: Mitch Albom
title: Tuesdays with Morrie

quote: Because I am a woman, I must make unusual efforts to succeed. If I fail, no one will say, 'She doesn't have what it takes." ~ ' They will say, 'Women don't have what it takes." -
author: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: We live out our lives as we are meant to live them-with some choice, with some chance, but mostly as a result of the persons we are.
author: Terry Brooks
title: The Druid of Shannara

quote: Don't be afraid of the shadows, that only means there's a light nearby.
author: Evanescence

quote: Don't go on discussing what a good person should be. Just be one.
author: Marcus Aurelius
title: Meditations

quote: Fourscore and seven years ago our fathers brought forth on this continent, a new nation, conceived in Liberty, and dedicated to the proposition that all men are created equal.
author: Abraham Lincoln
title: The Gettysburg Address

quote: Life is full of beauty. Notice it. Notice the bumble bee, the small child, and the smiling faces. Smell the rain, and feel the wind. Live your life to the fullest potential, and fight for your dreams.
author: Ashley  Smith

quote: There are not enough days in forever to allow me to fully express the depth of my love for you.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: I don’t want anyone to hold back who they are. It’s not okay… it’s not a good thing
author: Connor Franta

quote: Storms make trees take deeper roots.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: She was broken, I think it’s because she loved too much and she was always blind to the fact that love too is sometimes broken.
author: robert m drake

quote: Vote for the man who promises least; he'll be the least disappointing.
author: Bernard Baruch

quote: Nobody is exempt from the trials of life, but everyone can always find something positive in everything even in the worst of times.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: When life doesn't meet your expectations, it was important to take it with grace.
author: Patricia Briggs
title: When Demons Walk

quote: Because people don't have wings... We look for ways to fly.
author: Haruichi Furudate

quote: When I try, I fail.  When I trust,  He succeeds.
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: My atheism, like that of Spinoza, is true piety towards the universe and denies only gods fashioned by men in their own image, to be servants of their human interests.
author: George Santayana
title: Soliloquies in England & Later Soliloquies

quote: The heart is like a woman, and the head is like a man, and although man is the head of woman, woman is the heart of man, and she turns man's head because she turns his heart.
author: Peter Kreeft
title: Jesus-Shock

quote: Mother is a verb. It's something you do. Not just who you are.
author: Cheryl Lacey Donovan
title: The Ministry of Motherhood

quote: When she listened to songs that she loved on the radio, something stirred inside her. A liquid ache spread under her skin, and she walked out of the world like a witch.
author: Arundhati Roy
title: The God of Small Things

quote: Were knowledge all, what were our need To thrill and faint and sweetly bleed?
author: Christopher Brennan

quote: O love, O fire! once he drew With one long kiss my whole soul through My lips, as sunlight drinketh dew.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: There is no illusion greater than fear.
author: Lao Tzu, Tao Teh Ching

quote: To those who, in spite of everything, still choose goodness
author: Marie Lu
title: The Midnight Star

quote: Do not fear the thorns in your path, for they draw only corrupt blood.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: A poem begins in delight and ends in wisdom.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Have faith have faith. When you have nothing else have faith.
author: Francine Rivers
title: A Voice in the Wind

quote: There is only one who is all powerful, and his greatest weapon is love.
author: Stan Lee

quote: Don't let anyone take care of you. Can you maybe leave that for me to do? I mean, take care of you? Feel free to take care of me in return... because I think I'll need you to do that.
author: Melina Marchetta
title: The Piper's Son

quote: Hiduplah Untuk Memberi yang Sebanyak-banyaknya, Bukan untuk Menerima yang Sebanyak-banyaknya. (Pak Harfan)
author: Andrea Hirata
title: Laskar Pelangi

quote: Do not become someone else just because you are hurt. Be who you are & smile, it may solve, all problems you have got.
author: Santosh Kalwar
title: Quote Me Everyday

quote: The level of success you achieve will be in direct proportion to the depth of your commitment.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Now you people have names. That's because you don't know who you are. We know who we are, so we don't need names.
author: Neil Gaiman
title: Coraline

quote: Yes, terrible things happen, but sometimes those terrible things- they save you.
author: Chuck Palahniuk
title: Haunted

quote: The whole summer lay ahead of us-time to rest, time to wait. And when the future comes-no matter what comes with it-I'll be smarter. I'll be stronger. I'll be ready.
author: Ally Carter
title: Cross My Heart and Hope to Spy

quote: Love cures people, both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
author: Karl Menninger

quote: I will be generous with my love today. I will sprinkle compliments and uplifting words everywhere I go. I will do this knowing that my words are like seeds and when they fall on fertile soil, a reflection of those seeds will grow into something greater.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: How can you trust me, after what your own brother did to you?" "Because he was false", said Damen, "and you are true. I have never known a truer man.
author: C.S. Pacat
title: Kings Rising

quote: Have love for your inner Self and everything else is done for you.
author: Amit Ray
title: Peace Bliss Beauty and Truth: Living with Positivity

quote: It is books that are a key to the wide world; if you can't do anything else, read all that you can.
author: Jane Hamilton

quote: It's been said that love finds you when you're ready.
author: James Patterson; Maxine Paetro

quote: Just for the record: happiness is not bullshit.
author: Andrew Sean Greer
title: Less

quote: Never follow the crowd.
author: Bernard Baruch

quote: If I look at the mass I will never act.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: This new day has greeted us with no rules; unconditional opportunity. Do not dilute the power of this new day with the hardship of yesterday. Greet this day the way it has greeted you; with open arms and endless possibility.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Hard work is only a prison sentence when you lack motivation
author: Malcolm Gladwell
title: Outliers: The Story of Success

quote: Each man should frame life so that at some future hour fact and his dreaming meet.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Everytime I plant a seed,he say kill it before it grow, he say kill it before they grow.
author: Bob Marley

quote: One must work and dare if one really wants to live.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: When I pictured myself, it was always like just an outline in a colouring book, with the inside not yet completed.
author: Sarah Dessen

quote: The sidelines may be safer but life is played on the field
author: Wendy Mass
title: 13 Gifts

quote: Life is short. Kiss slowly, laugh insanely, love truly and forgive quickly
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: We never know how high we are till we are called to rise. Then if we are true to form our statures touch the skies.
author: Emily Dickinson
title: Collected Poems of Emily Dickinson

quote: Brimstone once told me that to stay true in the face of evil is a feat of strength.
author: Laini Taylor
title: Days of Blood & Starlight

quote: I cannot trust a man to control others who cannot control himself.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: There is a time to live and a time to die but never to reject the moment.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: it takes as much courage to have tried and failed as it does to have tried and succeded.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Something amazing happens when you're in love and don't give a damn about what day it is anymore.
author: Chad Sugg

quote: If you don’t have the time to do something right, where are you going to find the time to fix it?
author: Stephen King

quote: Society will always be too fragile to accept us for all that makes us beautiful.
author: robert m drake

quote: So what? You're another person, so of course you look different. What do you need to be ashamed for?
author: Yana Toboso

quote: Appreciate the moment of a first kiss; it may be the last time you own your heart.
author: robert m drake

quote: It occurred to me by intuition, and music was the driving force behind that intuition. My discovery was the result of musical perception.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Man jadda wajada Siapa yang bersungguh - sungguh, akan berhasil
author: Ahmad Fuadi

quote: Read books. Care about things. Get excited. Try not to be too down on youself. Enjoy the ever present game of knowing.
author: Hank Green

quote: A great human revolution in just a single individual will help achieve a change in the destiny of a nation and, further, can even enable a change in the destiny of all humankind.
author: Daisaku Ikeda
title: The Human Revolution

quote: What she had long believed was not true, and now the world was wide open to discover what was. It is like all my life I thought the sky was green.
author: Shannon Hale

quote: The More we value things, the less we value ourselves
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Strength is Life, Weakness is Death. Expansion is Life, Contraction is Death. Love is Life, Hatred is Death.
author: Vivekananda

quote: I want you to have big dreams, big goals. I want you to strive to achieve them. But I don't want to see you beating yourself up every time you make a mistake.
author: Kelley Armstrong
title: The Gathering

quote: In spite of everything I still believe that people are really good at heart. I simply can't build up my hopes on a foundation consisting of confusion, misery and death.
author: Anne Frank
title: The Diary of a Young Girl

quote: Better to shun the bait than struggle in the snare.
author: William Blake

quote: I don't regret the painful times; I bare my scars as if they were medals.
author: Paolo Coelho

quote: A thing worth having is a thing worth cheating for.
author: W.C. Fields

quote: We are constantly trying to hold it all together. If you really want to see why you do things, then don't do them and see what happens.
author: Michael A. Singer
title: The Untethered Soul: The Journey Beyond Yourself

quote: You don't win races by wishing, you win them by running faster than everyone else does.
author: Philip Pullman
title: Clockwork

quote: I can't understand why people are frightened of new ideas. I'm frightened of the old ones.
author: John Cage

quote: People are always telling me that i'm not like other girls...that i dont dress like other girls...that i dont act like other girls. But i'm my OWN person...i go to the beat of my own drum.
author: Miley Cyrus

quote: Go and get your things,' he said. 'Dreams mean work.
author: Paulo Coelho
title: By the River Piedra I Sat Down and Wept

quote: Everyone kept telling me not to worry someone will do something. No one did so I became someone and did something.
author: Mark A. Cooper
title: Absolutely Nothing

quote: To separate oneself from the burden, the angst, the anguish that we all encounter everyday. To say I am alive, I am wonderful, I am. I am. That is something to aspire to.
author: Garth Stein
title: The Art of Racing in the Rain

quote: I don't think you should wait. I think you should speak now.
author: Taylor Swift
title: Taylor Swift - Speak Now

quote: Indeed, the more we find to love, the more we add to the measure of our hearts.
author: Lloyd Alexander
title: The Black Cauldron

quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times -- always with the same person.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: The strength of a man isn't seen in the power of his arms. It's seen in the love with which he EMBRACES you.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Do not let the hero in your soul parish, in lonely frustration, for the life you deserved but never have been able to reach. Check your road and the nature of your battle. The world you desired can be won. It exists, it is real, it is possible, it is yours.
author: Ayn Rand
title: Atlas Shrugged

quote: You have forgotten the One who doesn't care about ownership, who doesn't try to turn a profit from every human exchange.
author: Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
title: The essential Rumi

quote: Mistakes. Trial and error. Same thing. Mistakes are how we learned to walk and run and that hot things burn when you touch them. You’ve made mistakes all your life and you’re going to keep making them.
author: Tamara Ireland Stone
title: Every Last Word

quote: We don’t truly appreciate what we have until it’s gone… We don’t really appreciate something until we have experienced some events; we don't really appreciate our parents until we ourselves have become parents. Be grateful for what you have now, and nothing should be taken for granted.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Even in the far future, never forget the you of right now Wherever you are right now, you’re just taking a break
author: BTS

quote: Your humans slaughter each other because of the color of your skin, or your faith or your plitics -- or for no reason at all -- too many of you hate as easily as you draw breath. - Magneto
author: Stan Lee

quote: Watch for the thing that will show itself to you. Because that thing, when you find it, will be your future.
author: Arthur Golden
title: Memoirs of a Geisha

quote: Behind all seen things lies something vaster; everything is but a path, a portal or a window opening on something other than iteself.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
title: Wind, Sand and Stars

quote: I don't believe in hate. To me it wastes too much time. People who hate waste so much of their life hating that they miss out on all the other stuff out here.
author: Jaycee Dugard
title: A Stolen Life

quote: True beauty lies in purity of the heart.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If there never was a night or day and memories could fade away, then we'd be nothing left but the dreams we made
author: Selena Gomez

quote: Failure is a greater teacher than success
author: Clarissa Pinkola Estés
title: Women Who Run With the Wolves

quote: If I work hard enough, there will be things I can do tomorrow that I can't do today.
author: Randy Pausch
title: The Last Lecture

quote: Happiness is the only thing worth fighting for in life.
author: Lilly Singh

quote: To do something that you feel in your heart that's great, you need to make a lot of mistakes. Anything that's successful is a series of mistakes.
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: I believe in some blending of hope and sunshine sweetening the worst lots. I believe that this life is not all; neither the beginning nor the end. I believe while I tremble; I trust while I weep.
author: Charlotte Bronte
title: Villette

quote: What you do is what matters, not what you think or say or plan.
author: Jason Fried
title: Rework

quote: It is our wounds that create in us a desire to reach for miracles. The fulfillment of such miracles depends on whether we let our wounds pull us down or lift us up towards our dreams.
author: Jocelyn Soriano
title: Mend My Broken Heart

quote: Never let anybody guess that you have a mind of your own. Above all be pure
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Onward and Upward! To Narnia and the North!
author: C.S. Lewis
title: The Horse and His Boy

quote: One of the lessons that I grew up with was to always stay true to yourself and never let what somebody else says distract you from your goals. And so when I hear about negative and false attacks, I really don't invest any energy in them, because I know who I am.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Here lies one whose name was writ on water.
author: John Keats

quote: I do like the world quite a lot.
author: Shannon Hale
title: Book of a Thousand Days

quote: Fear defeats more people than any other one thing in the world.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Everything will be alright in the end so if it is not alright it is not the end.
author: Deborah Moggach
title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel

quote: When I was One, I had just begun. When I was Two, I was nearly new. When I was Three I was hardly me. When I was Four, I was not much more. When I was Five, I was just alive. But now I am Six, I'm as clever as clever, So I think I'll be six now for ever and ever.
author: A.A. Milne
title: Now We Are Six

quote: she lived with hurricane eyes and fell in love with the way the waves collapsed against her cheeks.
author: Christopher Poindexter

quote: For too many centuries women have been being muses to artists. I wanted to be the muse, I wanted to be the wife of the artist, but I was really trying to avoid the final issue — that I had to do the job myself.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: In your own life it's important to know how spectacular you are.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Philosophy of science is about as useful to scientists as ornithology is to birds.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: But there's always a first time for everything
author: Melissa de la Cruz
title: Blue Bloods

quote: It is this belief in a power larger than myself and other than myself which allows me to venture into the unknown and even the unknowable.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: This was not a fearie tale. This was not the movies. This was life. It hurt more. It was excruciating. It was excruciatingly beautiful.
author: Francesca Lia Block
title: Violet & Claire

quote: I can tell you I love you as many times as you can stand to hear it, but all it does is remind us that love is not enough. Not even close.
author: Mark Andrus

quote: No matter how safe and beautiful it is, a cage is still a cage.
author: Jessica Spotswood
title: Born Wicked

quote: If you're serious about sanctification, you can expect to experience heart-wrenching moments that try your faith, your endurance, and your patience.
author: Sheri L. Dew
title: If Life Were Easy, It Wouldn't Be Hard: And Other Reassuring Truths

quote: If you're really listening, if you're awake to the poignant beauty of the world, your heart breaks regularly. In fact, your heart is made to break; its purpose is to burst open again and again so that it can hold evermore wonders.
author: Andrew Harvey

quote: Evil exists in us all, Torak. Some fight it. Some feed it. That's how it's always been.
author: Michelle Paver

quote: In what will survive me I am in harmony with my annihilation.
author: Georges Bataille

quote: Nalaman kong habang lumalaki ka, maraming beses kang madadapa. Bumangon ka man ulit o hindi, magpapatuloy ang buhay, iikot ang mundo, at mauubos ang oras.
author: Bob Ong

quote: Hard times build determination and inner strength. Through them we can also come to appreciate the uselessness of anger. Instead of getting angry nurture a deep caring and respect for troublemakers because by creating such trying circumstances they provide us with invaluable opportunities to practice tolerance and patience.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: Self-esteem comes from being able to define the world in your own terms and refusing to abide by the judgments of others.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: What would you attempt to do if you knew you could not fail?
author: Robert Schuller

quote: Tell all the Truth but tell it slant-- Success in Circuit lies Too bright for our infirm Delight The Truth's superb surprise  As Lightning to the Children eased With explanation kind The Truth must dazzle gradually Or every man be blind--
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: The dream was always running ahead of me. To catch up, to live for a moment in unison, was the miracle.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: The cause of most of man's unhappiness is sacrificing what he wants most for what he wants now.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: It’s funny, for all it took was a broken heart and that alone was enough, enough for her to do everything she ever dreamed of.
author: robert m drake

quote: Sometimes success isn't about making the right decision, it's more about making some decision.
author: Robin S. Sharma
title: The Leader Who Had No Title: A Modern Fable on Real Success in Business and in Life

quote: I am not a victim. No matter what I have been through, I'm still here. I have a history of victory.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Life doesn't just happen to you; you receive everything in your life based on what you've given.
author: Rhonda Byrne

quote: Living never wore one so much as the effort not to live.
author: Anais Nin

quote: It is our failure to become our perceived ideal that ultimately defines us and makes us unique. It's not easy, but if you accept your misfortune and handle it right your perceived failure can become a catalyst for profound re-invention.
author: Conan O'Brien

quote: A truth that no one knows is still the truth.
author: Sharon Shinn
title: Jenna Starborn

quote: No matter what happens in the world, however brutal or dystopian a thing, not all is lost if there are people out there risking themselves to document it. Little sparks cause fires, too.
author: Tomasz Jedrowski
title: Swimming in the Dark

quote: Biarkan orang lain menjalani kehidupan yang kecil, tetapi kamu jangan! Biarkan orang lain memperdebatkan soal-soal kecil, tetapi kamu jangan! Biarkan orang lain menangisik kepedihan-kepedihan kecil, tetapi kamu jangan! Biarkan orang lain menyerahkan masa depan mereka kepada orang lain, tetapi kamu jangan!
author: Habiburrahman El Shirazy

quote: If you can’t believe in miracles, then believe in yourself. When you want something bad enough, let that drive push you to make it happen. Sometimes you’ll run into brick walls that are put there to test you. Find a way around them and stay focused on your dream. Where there’s a will, there’s a way.
author: Isabel  Lopez
title: Isabel's Hand-Me-Down Dreams

quote: If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.
author: Les Brown

quote: It is easier, far easier, to obey another than to command oneself.
author: Irvin D. Yalom
title: When Nietzsche Wept

quote: Make visible what, without you, might perhaps never have been seen.
author: Robert Bresson

quote: If the world is to be healed through human efforts, I am convinced it will be by ordinary people, people whose love for this life is even greater than their fear.
author: Joanna R. Macy

quote: Look beyond yourself..
author: Michael  Jackson

quote: I admire those who do good and expect nothing in return.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Good ideas stay with you until you eventually write the story.
author: Brian Keene

quote: Some battles don’t have a winner. Sometimes the best a good general can hope for is a ceasefire
author: Emma Chase
title: Tangled

quote: Faster, Faster, until the thrill of speed overcomes the fear of death.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: It used to be about trying to do something. Now it's about trying to be someone.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Sometimes we know in our bones what we really need to do, but we're afraid to do it. Taking a chance and stepping beyond the safety of the world we've always known is the only way to grow, though and without risk there is no reward.
author: Wil Wheaton
title: Just a Geek: Unflinchingly Honest Tales of the Search for Life, Love, and Fulfillment Beyond the Starship Enterprise

quote: The word 'listen' contains the same letters as the word 'silent'.
author: Alfred Brendel

quote: You will write if you will write without thinking of the result in terms of a result, but think of the writing in terms of discovery, which is to say that creation must take place  between the pen and the paper, not before in a thought or afterwards in a recasting...   It will come if it is there and if you will let it come.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.
author: Criss Jami
title: Healology

quote: I shut my eyes in order to see.
author: Paul Gauguin

quote: We had the experience but missed the meaning. And approach to the meaning restores the experience in a different form.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: It was stupid to hope, she knew. But sometimes hope was all you had.
author: Cassandra Clare
title: City of Lost Souls

quote: If everyone helps to hold up the sky, then one person does not become tired.
author: Askhari Johnson Hodari
title: Lifelines: The Black Book of Proverbs

quote: I had to learn to live without you and I couldn't make sense of it, because I left so much of me inside of you.
author: robert m drake

quote: There is nothing more important than your eternal salvation.
author: Kirk Cameron

quote: Never miss an opportunity to show your love, especially to those close to you, because we are always at our most cautious with them for fear of being hurt.
author: Paulo Coelho
title: Manuscript Found in Accra

quote: People don't believe what you tell them. They rarely believe what you show them. They often believe what their friends tell them. They always believe what they tell themselves.
author: Seth Godin

quote: Most people fail in life not because they aim too high and miss, but because they aim too low and hit.
author: Les Brown

quote: Those who use religion for their own benefit are detestable. We are against such a situation and will not allow it. Those who use religion in such a manner have fooled our people; it is against just such people that we have fought and will continue to fight.
author: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk

quote: The more clearly we can focus our attention on the wonders and realities of the universe about us the less taste we shall have for the destruction of our race. Wonder and humility are wholesome emotions, and they do not exist side by side with a lust for destruction.  {Speech accepting the John Burroughs Medal}
author: Rachel Carson

quote: Books have a way of finding their way into our lives, usually, right when we need them the most.
author: Richard Denney

quote: The world is so full of a number of things, I ’m sure we should all be as happy as kings.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson
title: A Child's Garden of Verses

quote: Being against evil doesn't make you good. Tonight I was against it and then I was evil myself. I could feel it coming just like a tide... I just want to destroy them. But when you start taking pleasure in it you are awfully close to the thing you're fighting.
author: Ernest Hemingway
title: Islands in the Stream

quote: Never underestimate the power you have to take your life in a new direction.
author: Germany Kent

quote: I can’t cry so I have to laugh.
author: Maria Nhambu
title: Africa's Child

quote: Nobody sees a flower - really - it is so small it takes time - we haven't time - and to see takes time, like to have a friend takes time.
author: Georgia O'Keeffe
title: Georgia O'Keeffe

quote: I have already settled it for myself so flattery and criticism go down the same drain and I am quite free.
author: Georgia O'Keefe

quote: He who robs us of our dreams robs us of our life.
author: Virginia Woolf
title: Orlando

quote: There are no traffic jams on the extra mile.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: You know me better than you think, you know, and you shall know me better yet.
author: C.S. Lewis
title: The Magician's Nephew

quote: Suddenly, everything was beautiful. The way she viewed the world was nothing more but a reflection of herself.
author: robert m drake

quote: Dislike in yourself what you dislike in others.
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: The more you believed in yourself, the more you could trust yourself. The more you trust yourself, the less you compare yourself to others.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: I was good and bad, but never wicked.
author: Anne Rice

quote: The more you talk about them, the more important they will feel. The more you listen to them, the more important you will make them feel.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: No one lights a lamp in order to hide it behind the door: the purpose of light is to create more light, to open people's eyes, to reveal the marvels around.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The world has enough women who know how to be smart. It needs women who are willing to be simple. The world has enough women who know how to be brilliant. It needs some who will be brave. The world has enough women who are popular. It needs more who are pure. We need women, and men, too, who would rather be morally right than socially correct.
author: Peter Marshall

quote: Coming from your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man!
author: Stan Lee

quote: When it rains it pours. Maybe the art of life is to convert tough times to great experiences: we can choose to hate the rain or dance in it.
author: Joan Marques

quote: Real change is difficult at the beginning, but gorgeous at the end. Change begins the moment you get the courage and step outside your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Inspiration comes of working every day.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: It's better to have a few faithful friends than numerous shallow friendships.
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett
title: Friends 2 Lovers: The Unthinkable

quote: Don’t allow yourself to become disheartened when the thread doesn’t suit or seems unsightly to you. Wait and watch. Be patient and devoted. As the threads twist and turn, you will begin to understand, and you will see the pattern finally materialize in all its splendor.
author: Colleen Houck

quote: ... just because [butterflies'] lives were short didn't mean they were tragic... See, they have a beautiful life.
author: Lisa Genova
title: Still Alice

quote: The important thing is not the object of love, but the emotion itself.
author: Gore Vidal

quote: Bebek berjalan berbondong-bondong, akan tetapi burung elang terbang sendirian.
author: Soekarno
title: Indonesia Menggugat: Pidato Pembelaan Bung Karno di Muka Hakim Kolonial

quote: In order to attain the impossible, one must attempt the absurd.
author: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

quote: How would your life be different if...You were conscious about the food you ate, the people you surround yourself with, and the media you watch, listen to, or read? Let today be the day...You pay attention to what you feed your mind, your body, and your life. Create a nourishing environment conducive to your growth and well-being today.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: The Power Of One

quote: when you're cool for twenty, you get paid for twenty-one.
author: Miguel Pinero

quote: In the mist of Difficulty lies Opportunity.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The wise warrior avoids the battle.
author: Sun Tzu
title: The Art of War

quote: In a strong relationship, you should love your companion more than you need them.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: To be heroic is to be courageous enough to die for something; to be inspirational is to be crazy enough to live a little.
author: Criss Jami
title: Venus in Arms

quote: I am still determined to be cheerful and happy, in whatever situation I may be; for I have also learned from experience that the greater part of our happiness or misery depends upon our dispositions, and not upon our circumstances. a
author: Martha Washington

quote: You know my name, not my story. You've heard what I've done, but not what I've been through.
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett
title: Neglected but Undefeated: The Life of a Boy Who Never Knew a Mother’s Love

quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
author: John Quincy Adams

quote: Our men think earning money and ordering around others is where power lies. They don't think power is in the hands of the woman who takes care of everyone all day long, and gives birth to their children.
author: Malala Yousafzai
title: I Am Malala: The Story of the Girl Who Stood Up for Education and Was Shot by the Taliban

quote: Be a true Heart, not a follower.
author: Ed Sheeran

quote: You do not have to sit outside in the dark. If, however, you want to look at the stars, you will find that darkness is necessary. But the stars neither require nor demand it.
author: Annie Dillard
title: Teaching a Stone to Talk: Expeditions and Encounters

quote: Life consists of what man is thinking about all day.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Tough times don't last, tough people do, remember?
author: Gregory Peck

quote: The major work of the world is not done by geniuses. It is done by ordinary people, with balance in their lives, who have learned to work in an extraordinary manner.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: A wise man always has something to say, whereas a fool always needs to say something.
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: there is no moment more precious than the exact moment you are living now
author: Obert Skye
title: Leven Thumps and the Gateway to Foo

quote: Silent acquiescence in the face of tyranny is no better than outright agreement.
author: C.J. Redwine
title: Defiance

quote: Remember your humanity, and forget the rest.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Don't get set into one form, adapt it and build your own, and let it grow, be like water.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: What is the point of being on this Earth if you are going to be like everyone else?
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
title: Total Recall: My Unbelievably True Life Story

quote: Forget your voice, sing! Forget your feet, dance! Forget your life, live! Forget yourself and be!
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: On Wednesday, when the sky is blue, and I have nothing else to do, I sometimes wonder if it's true  That who is what and what is who."  - Winnie-the-Pooh
author: A.A. Milne

quote: Percy let me go, she croaked. You can't pull me up.   Never
author: Rick Riordan
title: The Mark of Athena

quote: Regret is counterproductive. It's looking back on a past that you can't change. Questioning things as they occur can prevent regret in the future.
author: Colleen Hoover
title: Slammed

quote: You're water. We're the millstone. You're wind. We're dust blown up into shapes. You're spirit. We're the opening and closing  of our hands. You're the clarity. We're the language that tries to say it. You're joy. We're all the different kinds of laughing.
author: Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
title: The essential Rumi

quote: Respect your efforts, respect yourself. Self-respect leads to self-discipline. When you have both firmly under your belt, that's real power.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: Everyone's on the cliff edge of normal. Everyone finds life an utter nightmare sometimes, and there's no 'normal' way of dealing with it... There is no normal, Evelyn.
author: Holly Bourne
title: Am I Normal Yet?

quote: Time is what keeps things from happening all at once.
author: Ann Brashares
title: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants

quote: The dictionary is the only place that success comes before work. work is the key to success, and hard work can help you accomplish anything.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Do what you love, think what you feel and live the way you want.
author: Santosh Kalwar
title: Quote Me Everyday

quote: It does not matter how long you live, but how well you do it.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: People who love themselves come across as very loving, generous and kind; they express their self-confidence through humility, forgiveness and inclusiveness.
author: Sanaya Roman
title: Living with Joy: Keys to Personal Power and Spiritual Transformation

quote: A child fish asks mother fish, 'Mother, why cannot we live on the Earth?' Mother fish replied, 'Dear… it is not the place for fish, it is the place for selfish
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: I would not sit waiting for some vague tomorrow, nor for something to happen. One could wait a lifetime, and find nothing at the end of the waiting. I would begin here, I would make something happen.
author: Louis L'Amour
title: Sackett's Land

quote: To be human is to be broken and broken is its own kind of beautiful.
author: robert m drake

quote: Beware of speaking too much, for it increases mistakes and engenders boredom.
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: The boy and his heart had become friends, and neither was capable now of betraying the other.
author: Paulo Coelho
title: The Alchemist

quote: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Some days are like this. And the only way to get through them is to remember that they are only one day, and that every day ends.
author: David Levithan
title: Six Earlier Days

quote: Sanctify yourself and you will sanctify society.
author: Francis Of Assisi

quote: Accidents happen. Our bones shatter, our skin splits, our hearts break. We burn, we drown, we stay alive.
author: Moïra Fowley-Doyle
title: Accident Season

quote: Blindness separates people from things; deafness separates people from people.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The same wind that uproots trees makes the grass shine.  The lordly wind loves the weakness and the lowness of grasses. Never brag of being strong.  The axe doesn't worry how thick the branches are. It cuts them to pieces. But not the leaves. It leaves the leaves alone.
author: Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
title: The essential Rumi

quote: Bird by bird, buddy. Just take it bird by bird.
author: Anne Lamott
title: Bird by Bird

quote: I feel infinite.
author: Stephen Chbosky
title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quote: When was the last time you woke up and realized that today could be the best day of your life?
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: If you have not done things worthy of being written about, at least write things worthy of being read.
author: Giacomo Casanova

quote: There's no reason to have a plan B because it distracts from plan A.
author: Will Smith

quote: And the only way to do great work is to love what you do.... Don't settle
author: Steve Jobs

quote: There is always a way out of a situation. Might be ugly. Might leave you feeling like the earth had gone and shifted under your feet. But there is always a way around.
author: Jojo Moyes
title: The Giver of Stars

quote: Don't let your habits become handcuffs
author: Elizabeth Berg
title: The Year of Pleasures

quote: Light is more important than the lantern, The poem more important than the notebook
author: Nizar Qabbani

quote: The most important thing is this: to be able at any moment to be free to choose a life that makes you happy.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: If you can't do great things, do small things in a great way.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: A man can't soar too high, when he flies with his own wings.
author: William Blake

quote: If you want something you've never had You must be willing to do something you've never done.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Love me or hate me I promise that it will never make or break me...<3
author: Tyra Banks
title: Tyra's Beauty Inside & Out

quote: Always be like a water. Float in the times of pain or dance like waves along the wind which touches its surface.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: Caminante, no hay puentes, se hace puentes al andar.   (Voyager, there are no bridges, one builds them as one walks.)
author: Gloria Anzaldúa

quote: The most basic and powerful way to connect to another person is to listen. Just listen. Perhaps the most important thing we ever give each other is our attention…. A loving silence often has far more power to heal and to connect than the most well-intentioned words.
author: Rachel Naomi Remen

quote: You only get one life. Live it to the fullest. All your miseries will be forgiven when you will be dead.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: Hearts can't be broken because they're made of marzipan.
author: Kerstin Gier
title: Smaragdgrün

quote: It’s never the value of water but thirst, it’s never the value of life but death and it’s never about the friendship but trust.
author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib AS

quote: What is grander than a country and more valuable than gold? Strength of heart.
author: Cornelius Elmore Addison
title: Tom Thorneval: Dream Merchant Extraordinaire

quote: Travel light, live light, spread the light, be the light.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: We have all forgotten what we really are. All that we call common sense and rationality and practicality and positivism only means that for certain dead levels of our life we forget that we have forgotten. All that we call spirit and art and ecstasy only means that for one awful instant we remember that we forget.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: Most people think happiness is about gaining something, but it's not. It's all about getting rid of the darkness you accumulate.
author: Carolyn Crane
title: Double Cross

quote: When purpose is not known, abuse is inevitable
author: Myles Munroe
title: Understanding The Purpose And Power Of Woman

quote: Arrogance on the part of the meritorious is even more offensive to us than the arrogance of those without merit: for merit itself is offensive.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: There are few sources of energy so powerful as a procrastinating college student.
author: Paul Graham
title: Hackers and Painters: Big Ideas from the Computer Age

quote: To put meaning in one's life may end in madness, But life without meaning is the torture Of restlessness and vague desire-- It is a boat longing for the sea and yet afraid.
author: Edgar Lee Masters
title: Spoon River Anthology

quote: Convictions are prisons.
author: Friedrich Nietzche
title: The Birth of Tragedy/Seventy-five Aphorisms/The Anti-Christ

quote: Let them call me a rebel and welcome. I feel no concern from it. But should I suffer the misery of devils, were I to make a whore of my soul.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Thus we never see the true state of our condition till it is illustrated to us by its contraries, nor know how to value what we enjoy, but by the want of it.
author: Daniel Defoe
title: Robinson Crusoe

quote: She wanted to do things without having to worry what others thought. She simply lived for her freedom.
author: Toshikazu Kawaguchi
title: Before the Coffee Gets Cold

quote: Please go for your dreams. Whatever your ideals, you can become whatever you want to become.
author: Michael  Jackson

quote: Being interesting isn't important. But being happy is. As well as being a person you're proud of
author: Holly Bourne
title: The Manifesto on How to Be Interesting

quote: That's a misconception, Lennie. The sky is everywhere, it begins at your feet.
author: Jandy Nelson
title: The Sky Is Everywhere

quote: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: When a person can't find a deep sense of meaning, they distract themselves with pleasure.
author: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: It doesn't matter who you are, or where you come from, or how much money you've got in your pocket. You have your own destiny and your own life ahead of you.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: To read is to empower, To empower is to write, To write is to influence, To influence is to change, To change is to live".
author: Jane Evershed

quote: The reward of a thing well done is having done it.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Seberapa indah mimpi, jika tetap mimpi?
author: Seno Gumira Ajidarma
title: Kitab Omong Kosong

quote: Faith is like radar that sees through the fog -- the reality of things at a distance that the human eye cannot see.
author: Corrie Ten Boom

quote: Remember that the happiest people are not those getting more, but those giving more.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: It is when things are at worst you will get the best.
author: Santosh Kalwar
title: You Can

quote: She was broken from moment to moment, watching her world collide she felt lost inside herself. She fell apart for a passion that flamed beneath her. She waited and died a hundred times, it dripped from her pores. The moment she let go, she soared over the stillness like the star she was born to be.
author: robert m drake

quote: when you came you cried and everybody smiled with joy; when you go smile and let the world cry for you.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Be not deceived, Wormwood, our cause is never more in jeopardy than when a human, no longer desiring but still intending to do our Enemy's will, looks round upon a universe in which every trace of Him seems to have vanished, and asks why he has been forsaken, and still obeys.
author: C.S. Lewis
title: The Screwtape Letters

quote: Human kind is made up of two sexes, women and men. Is it possible that a mass is improved by the improvement of only one part and the other part is ignored? Is it possible that if half of a mass is tied to earth with chains and the other half can soar into skies?
author: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk

quote: One who has loved truly, can never lose entirely. Love is whimsical and temperamental. Its nature is ephemeral, and transitory. It comes when it pleases,and goes away without warning. Accept and enjoy it while it remains, but spend no time worrying about its departure. Worry will never bring it back.
author: Napoleon Hill
title: Think and Grow Rich

quote: I don’t care,” I said, leaning my head back against the seat. “Can we just get lost and see where that lands us?
author: Alexandra Bracken
title: In the Afterlight

quote: ...there will be sleeping enough in the grave....
author: Benjamin Franklin
title: The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin

quote: A smile is the best makeup a girl could wear
author: Marilyn monroe

quote: Too many people spend too much time trying to perfect something before they actually do it. Instead of waiting for perfection, run with what you go, and fix it along the way…
author: Paul Arden

quote: The study of history is the best medicine for a sick mind; for in history you have a record of the infinite variety of human experience plainly set out for all to see: and in that record you can find for yourself and your country both examples and warnings: fine things to take as models, base things, rotten through and through, to avoid.
author: Livy
title: The History of Rome, Books 1-5: The Early History of Rome

quote: I do have a point to all this,” she continues. “There are like twenty people in that waiting room right now. Some of them are related to you. Some of them are not. But we’re all your family.” She stops now. Leans over me so that the wisps of her hair tickle my face. She kisses me on the forehead. “You still have a family,” she whispers.
author: Gayle Forman
title: If I Stay

quote: There is beauty everywhere; even in the dark, there is light, and that is the rarest kind of all.
author: Catherine Doyle
title: Vendetta

quote: Nobody is wired wrong, because there’s no wrong and right in the way we are.
author: hannah hart

quote: There is nothing frightening in the dark if you just face it.
author: L.J. Smith
title: The Captive Part II / The Power

quote: One discovers that destiny can be diverted, that one does not have to remain in bondage to the first wax imprint made on childhood sensibilities. Once the deforming mirror has been smashed, there is a possibility of wholeness. There is a possibility of joy.
author: Anais Nin

quote: You must learn to take a step back and visualize the whole piece. If you focus only on the thread given to you, you lose sight of what it can become.
author: Colleen Houck

quote: The moral of the story is even though that seemed like the end of the world back then, right now I can look back on it and laugh. And if anyone is going through something similar right now just know it will get better.
author: Phil Lester

quote: If you can't be honest with your friends and colleagues and loved ones, then what is life all about?
author: Sophie Kinsella
title: Can You Keep a Secret?

quote: There had been times when he knew, somewhere in him, that he would get used to it, whatever it was, because he had learnt that some hard things became softer after a very little while.
author: Nick Hornby
title: About a Boy

quote: The wish to travel seems to me characteristically human: the desire to move, to satisfy your curiosity or ease your fears, to change the circumstances of your life, to be a stranger, to make a friend, to experience an exotic landscape, to risk the unknown..
author: Paul Theroux
title: The Tao of Travel: Enlightenments from Lives on the Road

quote: Love me when I least deserve it, because that's when I really need it.
author: Swedish Proverb

quote: Advice is like snow; the softer it falls, the longer it dwells upon, and the deeper it sinks into the mind.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: You learn to write by writing, and by reading and thinking about how writers have created their characters and invented their stories. If you are not a reader, don't even think about being a writer.
author: Jean M. Auel

quote: Finding the lesson behind every adversity will be the one important thing that helps get you through it.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: How would your life be different if…You didn’t allow yourself to be defined by your past? Let today be the day…You stop letting your history interfere with your destiny and awaken to the opportunity to release your greatest self.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Life is so outrageous I could not have imagined it, made all the sweeter because it cannot last. It is all about today. Today is the best day ever because tomorrow might not happen.
author: Hendri Coetzee
title: Living The Best Day Ever

quote: Take Care Of Your Tongue Like The Way You Take Care Of Gold & Silver.
author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib A.S

quote: You have to rise above the squabbling and chaos, and keep believing. You have to always keep your goals in mind.” -Hera, goddess of marriage
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Take courage, my heart: you have been through worse than this. Be strong, saith my heart; I am a soldier; I have seen worse sights than this.
author: Homer
title: The Odyssey

quote: Never let yourself be persuaded that any one Great Man, any one leader, is necessary to the salvation of America. When America consists of one leader and 158 million followers, it will no longer be America.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: The media only writes about the sinners and the scandals, he said, but that's normal, because 'a tree that falls makes more noise than a forest that grows.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Child, you have to learn to see things in the right proportions. Learn to see great things great and small things small.
author: Corrie Ten Boom

quote: Sameron adion aso I shall sing a sweeter song tomorrow
author: Theocritus

quote: The house, the stars, the desert -- what gives them their beauty is something that is invisible!
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
title: The Little Prince

quote: What an utter disgrace it would be to find something truly magic and spend any time at all pretending and trying to convince yourself it is all just an unbelievably orchestrated and beautifully choreographed illusion.
author: Tyler Knott Gregson

quote: The Universe doesn't like secrets. It conspires to reveal the truth, to lead you to it.
author: Lisa Unger
title: Beautiful Lies

quote: The greatest revenge is massive success.
author: Les Brown

quote: A battle is won by him who is firmly resolved to win it.
author: Leo Tolstoy
title: War and Peace

quote: The wolves knew when it was time to stop looking for what they'd lost, to focus instead on what was yet to come.
author: Jodi Picoult
title: Lone Wolf

quote: ‎The day you become old is the day you're not looking for new experiences anymore.
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: And what, incidentally, do you think integrity is? The ability not to pick a watch out of your neighbor's pocket? No, it's not as easy as that. If that were all, I'd say ninety-five percent of humanity were honest, upright men. Only, as you can see, they aren't. Integrity is the ability to stand by an idea.
author: Ayn Rand
title: The Fountainhead

quote: Don't try to fix me, I'm not broken...
author: Evanescence

quote: I believe that everything that you do bad comes back to you. So everything that I do that's bad, I'm going to suffer from it. But in my mind, I believe what I'm doing is right. So I feel like I'm going to heaven
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Sometimes it's the same moments that take your breath away that breathe purpose and love back into your life.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Be the kind of person who dares to face life's challenges and overcome them rather than dodging them.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: There are two things that men should never weary of, goodness and humility; we get none too much of them in this rough world among cold, proud people.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson
title: Kidnapped

quote: Be wary of strong drink, it can make you shoot at the tax collector...and miss.
author: Robert A. Heinlein
title: Time Enough for Love

quote: I realized then that even though I was a tiny speck in an infinite cosmos, a blip on the timeline of eternity, I was not without purpose.
author: R.J. Anderson
title: Ultraviolet

quote: In a very real sense we have two minds, one that thinks and one that feels
author: Daniel Goleman
title: Emotional Intelligence: Why It Can Matter More Than IQ

quote: Don't think of introversion as something that needs to be cured...Spend your free the way you like, not the way you think you're supposed to.
author: Susan Cain
title: Quiet: The Power of Introverts in a World That Can't Stop Talking

quote: There are people who have money and people who are rich.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: Remember that things are not always as they appear to be… Curiosity creates possibilities and opportunities.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Like a missing tooth, sometimes an absence is more noticeable than a presence.
author: Jodi Picoult
title: Lone Wolf

quote: To see me does not necessarily mean to see my face. To understand my thoughts is to have seen me.
author: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk

quote: That's chess!" snapped Ron. "You've got to make some sacrifices!
author: J.K. Rowling
title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

quote: It was never about the world being too big, it was more like she was too much for the world to handle.
author: robert m drake

quote: Remember this. Hold on to this. This is the only perfection there is, the perfection of helping others. This is the only thing we can do that has any lasting meaning. This is why we're here. To make each other feel safe.
author: Andre Agassi
title: Open

quote: Me with nothing left to lose, plotting my big revenge in the spotlight. Give me violent revenge fantasies as a coping mechanism.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Patience is a virtue, but there comes a moment when you must stop being patient and take the day by the throat and shake it. If it fights back; fine. I'd rather end up bloody at the end of the day, then unhurt with no progress made, no knowledge gained. I'd rather have a no, then nothing. I'd forgotten that about myself.
author: Laurell K Hamilton

quote: Temptation is the feeling we get when encountered by an opportunity to do what we innately know we shouldn't.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: It was the living who ignored the strange and wonderful, because life was too full of the boring and mundane.
author: Terry Pratchett
title: Reaper Man

quote: Rich People plan for three generations Poor people plan for Saturday night
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: It's the people who never learn the word  impossible  who make history, because they're the ones who keep trying.
author: Leigh Bardugo
title: Wonder Woman. Warbringer

quote: The energy of hatred won't get you anywhere; but the energy of forgiveness, which reveals itself through love, will transform your life in a positive way.
author: Paulo Coelho
title: The Zahir

quote: If you only write when inspired, you may be a fairly decent poet, but you'll never be a novelist.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: You kick ass Sam. And don't forget it
author: Pittacus Lore
title: The Power of Six

quote: Together, we will raise the dunes from the earth, and rain death from the sky. Together, we are capable of anything.
author: Hafsah Faizal
title: We Hunt the Flame

quote: Sometimes a flame must level a forest to ash before new growth can begin.
author: A.G. Howard
title: Splintered

quote: The greatest challenge of the day is: how to bring about a revolution of the heart, a revolution which has to start with each one of us?
author: Dorothy Day

quote: Dive deep. Drown willingly
author: Ted Dekker
title: White: The Great Pursuit

quote: So that's my wish for you, and all of us, and my wish for myself. Make New Mistakes. Make glorious, amazing mistakes. Make mistakes nobody's ever made before. Don't freeze, don't stop, don't worry that it isn't good enough, or it isn't perfect, whatever it is: art, or love, or work or family or life.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: There are only two forces at work in this world- black and white. Only people are grey.
author: Chris Heimerdinger
title: Gadiantons and the Silver Sword

quote: It's a sad day when you find out that it's not accident or time or fortune, but just yourself that kept things from you.
author: Lillian Hellman

quote: This first glance of a soul which does not yet know itself is like dawn in the heavens; it is the awakening of something radiant and unknown.
author: Victor Hugo
title: Les Misérables

quote: I want to Live! Not Die, Not Hide, LIVE!
author: Margaret Peterson Haddix
title: Among the Hidden

quote: Faith don't come in a bushel basket, Missy. It come one step at a time. Decide to trust Him for one little thing today, and before you know it, you find out He's so trustworthy you be putting your whole life in His hands.
author: Lynn Austin
title: Candle in the Darkness

quote: You make mistakes, mistakes don't make you
author: Maxwell Maltz

quote: Grace isn't a little prayer you chant before receiving a meal. It's a way to live.
author: Jacqueline Winspear

quote: You often feel tired, not because you've done too much, but because you've done too little of what sparks a light in you.
author: Alexander Den Heijer
title: Nothing You Don't Already Know

quote: Your beliefs will be the light by which you see, but they will not be what you see and they will not be a substitute for seeing.
author: Flannery O'Connor
title: Mystery and Manners: Occasional Prose

quote: I was always looking outside myself for strength and confidence, but it comes from within. It is there all the time.
author: Anna Freud

quote: Sure I am this day we are masters of our fate, that the task which has been set before us is not above our strength; that its pangs and toils are not beyond our endurance. As long as we have faith in our own cause and an unconquerable will to win, victory will not be denied us.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: The easiest way to do anything is properly.
author: K. J. Parker
title: The Proof House

quote: To know you are ignorant is the beginning of wisdom.
author: Marion Zimmer Bradley

quote: Your life begins to change the day you take responsibility for it.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Be natural my children. For the writer that is natural has fulfilled all the rules of art."  (Last words, according to Dickens's obituary in The Times.)
author: Charles Dickens
title: Five Novels: Oliver Twist, A Christmas Carol, David Copperfield, A Tale of Two Cities, Great Expectations

quote: It’s weird, how you have no idea how far you’ve come until suddenly you can’t find the way back.
author: Emma Lord
title: Tweet Cute

quote: The universe is a million billion light-years wide, and every inch of it would kill you if you went there. This is the position of the universe with regards to human life.
author: Martin Amis

quote: Happiness is a mysterious thing, to be found somewhere between too little and too much.
author: Ruskin Bond
title: A Book of Simple Living

quote: Your tomorrow depends entirely on what you do today.
author: Ghandi

quote: Baby you're a firework, c'mon show 'em what you're worth..." ~Firework
author: Katy Perry

quote: Enjoy the limitless bliss consciousness here and now. The reality of you lies much beyond your sensory perceptions and boundaries.
author: Amit Ray

quote: I never loved another person the way I loved myself.
author: Mae West

quote: Don't forget your history nor your destiny
author: Bob Marley

quote: Do good, live in the most positive and joyful way possible every day.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Love stories are written in millimeters and milliseconds with a fast, dull pencil whose marks you can barely see, they are written in miles and eons with a chisel on the side of a mountiantop
author: Gabrielle Zevin
title: Memoirs of a Teenage Amnesiac

quote: Until you change how you get things done, you'll never know what works best.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: There is no greater insight into the future than recognizing...when we save our children, we save ourselves
author: Margaret Mead

quote: If there is anything that links the human to the divine, it is the courage to stand by a principle when everybody else rejects it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: It’s never overreacting to ask for what you want and need.
author: Amy Poehler

quote: We think you'll find that every woman in her heart of hearts longs for three things: to be romanced, to play an irreplaceable role in a great adventure, and to unveil beauty. That's what makes a woman come alive.
author: John Eldredge
title: Captivating: Unveiling the Mystery of a Woman's Soul

quote: This is who the fuck I am.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: What I stand for is what I stand on.
author: Wendell Berry

quote: Deeds will not be less valiant because they are unpraised.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
title: The Lord of the Rings

quote: Sometimes it falls upon a generation to be great, you can be that generation
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: And I remembered something else that makes us human: faith, the only weapon in our arsenal to battle doubt.
author: Jodi Picoult
title: Change of Heart
